name: The Moisturizing Soft Cream Moisturizer
about: What it is:An ultrasoft cream that is ideal for balanced to dry skin to visibly diminish lines and wrinkles..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Fine Lines and Wrinkles, Dryness, and Loss of Firmness and Elasticity.Formulation:Cream.Highlighted Ingredients:- Miracle Broth™: Helps support lipids to plump skin from within and renew a youthful look..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:This cream leaves skin visibly plumper, firmer, nourished, and lifted. It was built on 50 years of skincare science and is powered by La Mer’s visible youth-regenerating Miracle Broth™ to help skin brace against future signs of aging.
ingredients: -Miracle Broth™: Helps support lipids to plump skin from within and renew a youthful look. .-Lime Tea: Contains a proprietary antioxidant to help neutralize skin-aging free radicals. .-Multi-Sized Moisture Spheres: Billions of spheres target delivery of Miracle Broth™ with 3D precision. ...ALGAE EXTRACT {ALGAE EXTRACT},CYCLOPENTASILOXANE {CYCLOPENTASILOXANE},TOCOPHERYL reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Yes it is winter, but I live in the desert. Temperature is mild. This cream has the right consistency for this climate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ok! I love this product so so so much! It is so good and got rid of my acne literally overnight. It got rid of scaring tissue I have had since I was so young! The only reason I do not give it a higher is because it is so so so expensive. But overall such a good product

reviews.review_title: Must have for dry skin! Gotta buy this!!

reviews.review_text: This stuff is SO hydrating. I was a little disappointed by the size for the price, and worried the container would break so I keep it in the nice packaging it arrived it to avoid dropping it and the ceramic breaking, but the product is amazing and has helped hydrate my skin so Much!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When first trying it, I didn’t have the best impression of it because the cream was cold and hard to scoop. Now coming back to it, it’s more whipped and easier to pick up. Is it worth the price? Not sure I would personally buy it. But I also can’t think of anything cheaper as a dupe so maybe for that reason it is worth a heartier price tag. The cream feels luxurious and leaves a nice shine, gleam to the skin/gleam to the skin but idk

reviews.review_title: A must have in my daily facial care!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product this past few weeks, I have seen a significant result. I feel my skin hydrated throughout the day. It gives me the glass skin look. I use it along with the facial mist and the results are just incredible! i highly recommend it. i have a really sensitive skin, and i always hesitate to try new face products. It’s definitely worth paying for. I am so happy I switched to this soft cream. i am really happy with the results.

I can't even say how the product works because the scent gave me a migraine within minutes of putting it on. The scent is very strong and reminds me of an old lady. The cream felt luxurious but I can't survive the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this cream amazingly...I have oily face .over 5 to 9 hrs still I don't see my face oily plus gives beautiful look to my skin and puffy under my eyes skin. get asked if I have done any cosmetics to my face .I know it's expensive cream but good to invest good products when it comes to ur own body and face .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NOTHING is better for my skin.  I have been using it for years as an eye cream and on my whole face for special occasions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was a little worried because the smell reminds me of sunscreen and I really don't like that smell. However the feel of the cream feels thick and creamy. I have oily skin so I prefer to use this at night to refrain from extra sweat. Overall it feels nice on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer Moisturizing Soft Cream is a luxurious skincare product that lives up to its reputation. From the moment you apply it, you'll notice its rich, yet lightweight texture, sinking effortlessly into your skin. It hydrates deeply, leaving your skin feeling incredibly soft and supple. While the price point may be steep, the results speak for themselves. It's perfect for those seeking intense hydration and a touch of luxury in their skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is honestly one of the first moisturizers I have used that has left me waking up still feeling moisturized! I have dry/combo skin (more on the dry side) and most moisturizers I use feel like they only keep my skin hydrated for a few hours. I used the La Met moisturizing soft cream at night before bed and my skin was still glowy and so hydrated when I woke up. Absolutely keeping this in my routine. Also it doesn’t feel heavy or greasy which is something I dislike in creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always wanted to try La Mer and I finally got the opportunity. I love the texture and it lived up to the hype of leaving my skin super soft. For the price, it won’t be my everyday moisturizer, but it’s definitely luxury in a bottle for those days my skin needs some extra TLC.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer The Moisturizing Soft Cream is my go-to skincare product for achieving hydrated and nourished skin. Before using this luxurious cream, my skin often felt dry and lacked moisture, leaving it looking dull and tired. However, after incorporating La Mer The Moisturizing Soft Cream into my daily routine, my skin feels incredibly soft, supple, and deeply moisturized. The cream has transformed my complexion, leaving it radiant and rejuvenated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizer is very hydrating! It applies smoothly and not greasy or thick. It absorbs into the skin nicely. Light and gentle fragrance. Barely even noticed but intentionally smelled for it for the review. My skin felt very dehydrated before and noticed with other moisturizers, my skin would quickly feel dry again within hours. This made my skin feel hydrated all day! Will continue using this item!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This made my skin feel moisturized and glowy!  It does have a scent but I don’t mind the smell, it’s a powdery spa smell with hint of floral. Also, looked so good under my makeup, made everything look more luminous.💕

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: THIS!! This moisturizing cream is hands down the best moisturizer I have ever tried. It leaves my skin super hydrated and soft. The formula is absolutely amazing. I had always wanted to tried this brand, and I’m so glad I did because it did not disappoint. 100/10 recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this cream!!! I have been on the hunt for a moisturizer that will help my skin transition throughout the changing seasons and this is the one! I highly recommend if you have combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who's always on the lookout for skincare products that deliver the best results, I can without a doubt say that the La Mer Moisturizing Soft Cream exceeded my expectations.  From the moment I applied it, I could feel its soft and silky texture sinking into my skin, leaving it feeling unbelievably soft and smooth. One of the most impressive aspects of this cream is how it tackled my fine lines. Over time, I noticed a significant reduction in the appearance of my pesky wrinkles, giving my skin a more youthful and revitalized look. The benefits of using this moisturizer went beyond just surface-level improvements. Not only did it provide immediate hydration, but its long-term effects left my skin looking smoother and more radiant than ever before. Plus, knowing that it's formulated by La Mer gave me added confidence in its efficacy. Its ability to deliver visible results, from smoother skin to removing fine lines, makes it worth every penny. If you're looking for a moisturizer that truly lives up to its promises, I highly recommend giving this one a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: There is a reason people are obsessed with La Mer. It is definitely worth the price point. The product is soooo smooth and hydrating. I can feel and notice the difference in my skin after a week of use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer moisturizer is the moisturizer of ALL moisturizers! It leaves your skin feeling fresh and brand new, and hydrated. Get the compact size, to carry in your purse. This is great to use underneath your makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product by La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion. I have used this cream day/night on my under eyes everyday since I received it and it has made a huge difference in my skin, wrinkles and under eye bags. Brightens and tightens my skin, and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My bank account is really going to hate me for saying this, but OH MY, do I love the Soft Cream by LaMer. I’ve tried it with serums, with toner, and all by its lonesome, and after every use my skin was always the same: plump, soft, smooth, and hydrated. In the mornings after use, I wake up with even-toned, smoother looking skin, and honestly, I kind of hate that I love it. RIP my money.

reviews.review_title: I will be coming back for more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be buying this product from now on! It’s great for morning and night time routines, but I would like to focus on what it does for my sensitive skin after removing my makeup. I’ve been using it for the past 2 weeks and it’s safe to say I am confident with wearing my makeup everyday from now because it repairs my skin overnight after the irritation caused by using makeup wipes. I also love that it keeps my skin supple and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by Skeepers to try this cream out and wow. It’s like a magic potion and I understand why all the girlies go crazy over La Mer! Is so luxuriously thick but not heavy. It has a very fresh and interesting smell that gives “rich” in the best way, even though it’s free of fragrance. It left my skin so soft and smooth after a few uses and I wasn’t drying out at any point in the day or showing up oily. My skin was balanced, nourished, and looks like I chugged a bunch of collagen. I wish this wasn’t so pricey but I will say a little goes a long way so it will last!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Moisturizer cream is amazing.   Keep my skin soft and hydrated all day. Feels light weight.  Absorb into my skin immediately leaving it looking fresh and healthy.  I really recommend it  very much. Go and yours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This soft cream absorbs into my skin nicely and feels like it helps with plumping my dull skin. The scent is also nice and not too overpowering. I wish I could afford the full sized product. The only negative is the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For years, I've heard that La Mer products are top-tier, and this moisturizing cream certainly lives up to the hype! Despite its thick consistency, applying it is smooth and effortless. The hydration it provides is truly exceptional.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have pretty dry and sensitive skin but I heard great things about La Mer so when I saw there was a gifted product I knew I wanted to give it a try. I loved the smell it’s light but fresh smelling. The lotion hydrates my face and leaves it feeling quite soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is really soft and made my skin feel so amazing. Literally called the soft cream for a reason. My skin also felt really hydrated and refreshing. It gave my skin a glow. Love how it made my skin feel.

reviews.review_title: Purchase if you want to spoil your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this face cream. I loved how hydrated my skin felt after use. I loved the scent. Smells really good and clean; it smells like roses to me. I really enjoyed this product and I would give it a 5/5 but I feel like the price is a bit steep, so for that reason I gave this product a 4/5. My skin feels nice and plump after use but I def think more affordable face creams can do the same job. Would I buy it occasionally if I want to spoil myself? yes!! But def not a staple for financial reasons.

reviews.review_title: Say goodbye to dry skin and hello hydrated skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is soft more hydrated since using this cream. My wrinkles on my forehead even look smoother and less noticeable. Before I used this my chin was flakey and dry most the time but been using this for a few days and my chin is smooth no flakes. My skin is softer and younger looking after using it for a little over 5 days. I definitely would recommend you try this if your struggle with dry skin and winkles. My skin has never been better for sure! It has a fresh scent and creamy consistency. The first photo is before you can see my wrinkles more than in the photo after I started using the cream which is the second photo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream is the perfect consistency, it isn’t too thick or thin. It leaves my skin feeling very moisturized without an oily finish which I appreciate. It has a faint fresh and clean scent that isn’t too over the top!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good cream moisturizer for me! My skin feels better after using it, looks good and looks healthy. I newer tried this brand, that my first time. I use it about one week and I can see that it’s good for me and I can recommend this cream

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so luxurious but honestly I don’t think it’s worth the money. It’s super moisturizing but I’ve used plenty of other moisturizers that are just as good if not better. In my opinion I don’t think it’s worth the cost JUST for a moisturizer. It is really nice though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try La Mer since I was literally 12 years old and saw that every single one of my favorite celebs mentioned it in magazines or in their favorite things and skin care videos. I am SO excited to finally have gotten my hands on it. I put it on after showering/washing my face and it soaks in SO nicely. My makeup goes on so cleanly after using this and my face feels smooth and moisturized. I am excited to continue using this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received la mer for exchange for my honest opinion , I will say I am big fan of la mer brand & I am so loyal to the brand I have been using the brand for over 8 years now , I can say this is only brand that save my skin , its really work deeply to the skin , and in my opinion there's nothing like la mar , yes it's litter expensive but it's really worth every penny , the cream will last you long time , small amount will cover all the face , highly recommended to try .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so wonderful! It feels so fluffy and lightweight on the skin and smells pleasant. I also felt moisturized for about 30 minutes longer than I'm used to, which is great. Grateful for the opportunity to try this! Thank you so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received The Moisturizing Soft Cream Complementary from La Mer. This cream is lightweight and absorbs fast. My skin was very dry before using this cream. After it felt much more hydrated. Since this sample jar is a small size, it was difficult to test for enough days. I would love to test a larger size to see more results over time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this product and I’ve been using it for a few days. I have dry/combo skin from using tretinoin and need a hydrating moisturizer. this leaves my skin feeling hydrated and smooth. It does have a fragrance that I don’t prefer, but it’s not too overpowering. I have sensitive skin so I prefer non-fragrance products. however, its insanely expensive and i could never justify paying such an outrageous price for a moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is incredibly soft and light. I do not like when creams are heavy on my skin. The It melted right in and was seamless in my skincare routine. My skin felt nourished and soft after use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got to try a sample size so i can’t fully judge the product but for the price you pay i believe you can get better products with same formula so not worth the money you pay for a moisturizer. I would reconsider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I received this item complimentary in exchange for a review.  I love the La Mer moisturizing soft cream. The cream feels nice and creamy, but it doesn't feel heavy or oily on my skin. The texture is very nice and leaves my skin feeling so hydrated!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: With this moisturizer being as pricey as it is ($200 for 1oz), I was expecting it to be the GOAT of moisturizers. Unfortunately it left my skin feeling greasy and not hydrated. I received a complimentary sample size for testing and am glad I don’t feel I need to finish an entire jar. I am also not a fan of the powdery floral scent, very old fashioned smelling and off-putting. I’ve seen some boss on this product but could never justify that price tag, it is a miss for me. Don’t believe the hype. To the La Mer team, if you are looking to capture a younger audience to keep this brand alive you really need to step it up. There are so many budget-friendly moisturizers that perform (and smell) better than this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream! My skin felt super hydrated after using it. It quickly absorbed into my skin and I felt moisturized right away. It is not greasy or oily at all, nor is it too thick making it difficult to apply. I could see myself using this cream as my go-to every night (if that was in my budget!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure the price warrants the quality & results of this product. I've been using this for a few weeks now, and my skin doesn't look any more moisturized or feel any more hydrated than when using my normal moisturizer. I noticed the instructions were a little different than applying most moisturizers, and I did follow them.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: BEST moisturizer I have ever used. Provides lasting moisture making my skin softer and more glowy! This is a staple in my skincare routine! Plus it smells amazing! Would recommend to anyone with dryer skin!

a luscious soft cream that feels great on my face. not only does it keep my face moisturized, but it also smells great!! nothing overpowering. i actually look forward to my skincare routine because i love the smell of this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product smells sooo good and goes on very smooth. It left my skin feeling velvety and shiny but not too shiny. I wish it wasn’t as fragranced, however, because it tends to clash with my other skincare and/or perfume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: When I first used this product, I loved how nourishing and moisturizing it made my skin feel! This is such a good product for dry to combo skin types. I have both skin types and after using this moisturizer, it made my skin feel soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this leave my skin hydrated and moisturized the whole day and you don't need to reapply! I can't believe it took me this long to try this product! I would recommend this product(:

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product is so yummy! has a very clean beautiful scent. before application my skin was dry and my fine lines were standing out/ immediately after application my skin had a glow and plump to it!!!! goes on thin but stays locked in for glowy dewy hydration. i have combination skin and i think this is great everyday moisturizer! my skin doesn't do well with thick lotions but most sheer thin lotions don't penetrate deep enough for me; this moisturizer is amazing! obsessed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry to normal skin and I struggle with fine lines and dullness. I did enjoy how emollient the cream and it does soak into the skin nicely without leaving a noticeable film on the skin. I did not see a big difference in my fine lines, however my skin felt nourished but it is not worth $200.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for the Dry Winter Months!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for my dry skin. I love to use this at night as I feel it is a heavier formula and can really moisturizer my skin, leaving my skin soft and smooth in the am. I love that I found this moisturizer during the winter as it is SAVING my skin. 👏🏻👏🏻

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer moisturizing cream left my skin feeling so soft and hydrated! It has a beautiful luxurious scent to it I like the minis for travel but the full size lasts a long time too! I would highly recommend to add to your skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream really made my skin feel hydrated, while leaving it smooth! Ive had creams in the past leave a sticky or greasy residue after application but not this one! Pleasantly surprised with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVEEEEEEE this cream! La Mer is fire period but the way this cream has my face so plump and moisturized? It’s easily one of the best moisturizers I’ve used in years! It’s definitely worth the purchase!

reviews.review_title: A new addition to my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I finally understand all the hype about this moisturizer. I have very dry sensitive skin and I am always looking for products to help me hydrate my skin as much as possible without causing any break outs. I applied this cream right after cleaning my face and I immediately saw a difference. My skin felt softer, hydrated and firmer. This has really transformed my dry skin and it’s really worth the investment. A new addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin typically gets dry during the colder seasons and I’m always looking for a good moisturizer to help keep my face refreshed! I definitely have my favorite moisturizer and I think I’m going to be adding this one to my list as well! I wasn’t a huge fan of the initial smell but it’s not super noticeable and overall my skin feels amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This sincerely moisturized my face so nicely and a little product really goes a long way . This is going to last me for a minute because you don’t need a lot just to moisturize your face . I can’t wait purchase another one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a mini sample set with two soft creams inside. I applied it right after the shower and do not feel dry at all. I have very sensitive dry skin so it’s hard to find a product that works and won’t give me any rashes. I like this one so far. Thank you La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I first tried this cream I immediately knew it was going to leave my skin feeling plump and hydrated. After trying it for a couple of days, I can honestly say it’s the truth. My skin feels soo amazing and moisturized.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is very hydrating but yet light weight! This is such a great product if you are looking to hydrate and firm your skin! I noticed a huge difference in just a couple uses! You will see fine lines look less defined. And dry patches disappear! A little goes a long way! The product is on the thicker side but if you pat it into skin you will get the best results! It does have a fragrance to the product but I quite enjoy the smell! I feel very fresh when I use the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream smells so good! So luxurious! It is a very thick consistency. It makes my skin feel so soft and hydrated. I definitely see why it’s such a pricey product. It leaves your skin feeling extremely soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As a dry girlie, I'm always looking for moisturizers that will actually leave my skin feeling hydrated and glowy. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the cream that I received from La Mer. The texture is so soft, it feels like silk and leaves the skin nice, smooth and healthy looking. I definitely recommend it, you can see a big difference when you apply the cream. I like the subtle smell, very delicate.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I don’t know how I hadn’t tried this cream before! It is super moisturizing I love the texture and the softness it leaves on the skin, I love it and I will continue to use it apart from the fact that its smell is very soft! I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is super light weight but packs a punch of hydration. The moment i put it on my skin it immediately made my skin so plump and soft. The only thing im not a fan of is the scent of the moisturizer. Based on not liking the scent i don’t think i would purchase especially at the price point it’s at !

reviews.review_title: Made my skin feel instantly hydrated!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to try this, and so glad I finally got the chance to! This cream made my skin feel instantly hydrated! reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I now understand the hype of this moisturizer! It works soo good my skin is combo to oily but lately my skin has been dry and this is definitely helping

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh la mer, you are the epitome of luxury. Not only does this cream make my skin feel amazing, it smells amazing. Normally I’m sensitive but i have no problems with the ingredients here. If you’re looking for luxe, it’s right here!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great moisturizer I love it, using this has done a transformation for my face I may now need to stock up on this because it so popular and everyone raves about this now I know why.! This was for free for review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super luxe as you can imagine. One opening it smells really nice, not too strong at all. It goes on nice and smooth, not too heavy, not sticky. It makes my face feel soft and looks glowy. There’s also a feeling of firmness in a good way. Get you some honey!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The moisturizing soft cream definitely leaves my skin feeling so moisturized. It helps to reduce fine lines and helps my skin look more plumper. It visibly improves dryness and skin firmness. I love how this moisturizer makes my face feel and look. And, I love that it helps with future signs of aging. This moisturizer has a beautiful, light floral scent and absorbs quickly into my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this La Mer moisturizer is i will say The Best out there . After only 3-4 uses i have noticed my dry skin looks so much more hydrated and plumped. I cant wait to keep using it and see more results from this magic cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am hooked!! This has made my skin feel immediately softer and more hydrated. I have been struggling with dry skin and acne, and this has really helped. It hasn’t made me break out at all. I really like this and will definitely purchase when I’m out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this cream is super hydrating and feels so nice on the skin. it’s lightweight and doesn’t feel greasy which i love. it has a very subtle smell that’s not overpowering, which is my personal preference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! Finally got to try it to see the hype and why it is so expensive and people claim it is worth it and I can agree it is! It’s so creamy and hydrating and it lasts all night and gives me a nice glow

reviews.review_title: The KING of all facial creams
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite moisturizer I have ever used! I have sensitive skin, and this moisturizes help my skin feel like a dream, and doesn’t break me out.My face is smooth, it blends well with my other skin serums and looks great under makeup. After using this product for about 2 weeks, my skin was softer than it had ever been. I had no blemishes and my fine lines has disappeared.

reviews.review_title: This product is a must have
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the la mer soft cream and absolutely loved it!! It is so creamy and hydrating which I really like perfect for combo skin dry to medium I would highly recommend this cream for all ages skin it is the best  I did notice that before I used it I had super dry skin and after it did make my skin more hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cream ever! I’ve been introduced to La Mer years ago. The soft cream is good for my combo skin type. Not too heavy but super nourishing and light. Perfect for any season. Make sure you warm the product up before pressing into the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE it! I have very dry skin and this moisturizer works wonders in the morning and I love how it sets my makeup for the day as well. I don’t need primer when I use this. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it as a gift from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. My first impression is that the cream is very rich. Despite having oily skin, it doesn't feel heavy. However, it is a bit sticky at the same time. Overall, I think it’s a great cream for drier skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely in love with this moisturizer! It has a nice floral scent, it’s super hydrating, and it absorbs into the skin quickly! Some moisturizers take a while to seep into the skin, but this one you can feel a difference pretty soon after application and it leaves your skin feeling super soft! I also love that it doesn’t leave a weird film on your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is absolutely fantastic! It has a lightweight texture that absorbs quickly into the skin without leaving any greasy residue. After using it for a few weeks, I've noticed a significant improvement in the hydration levels of my skin. It feels smoother, softer, and more supple.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff is so so so good! I’ve always wanted to try this and I’m so glad I was finally able too. It’s so hydrating and nourishing for my skin. My skin feels plumper and healthier. I can’t wait to try more products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the 3.5ml sample which is very small. The product is nice and left my skin feeling smooth. The sample I used was very small so I’m not sure about long term results. For the price I don’t know if I would get this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

Pros: thick consistency, leaves skin semi tacky for a good foundation application. Cons: strong scent (doesn’t bother me but could if you are sensitive to it), also feels semi greasy on oily parts of face.

reviews.review_title: The best moisturizer cream I’ve ever used.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve notice a big difference since I’ve added this into my everyday routine. My skin looks hydrated and plumped throughout the day. I can’t stop recommending this moisturizer to my sisters and friends. It’s the most hydrating cream I’ve used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super hydrating and nourishing! I love how it’s lightly scented. I am concerned it might be much for sensitive skin but overall pleasant. I wish the packaging was better im some way or came with a spoon.

reviews.review_title: A new must have in my daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer’s The Moisturizing Soft Cream is a true luxury for your skin! I love this product! https://app.im.skeepers.io/c/hqr5z/r/hbaij

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream does exactly what it says in the name. It leaves the skin feeling baby soft. This moisturizer has a thinner texture yet is extremely hydrating. You can practically feel the product melt into your skin immediately, leaving the skin with a silky smooth texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels great for my skin type, that’s dry and dehydrated, irritated with tendency to redness after the winter season. Pleasant not overwhelming scent, high quality ingredients, La Mer never disappoints

reviews.review_title: This is a must have in my routine now!

reviews.review_text: I instantly saw a glow in my skin after putting this soft cream on and before putting it on my skin looked dull and not bright. Smells good and goes on smoothly and instantly helped. Minimizes fine lines on my face and I love it !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer's The Moisturizing Soft Cream is a true indulgence for the skin. Not only does my skin feel instantly nourished and plump, but it also appears visibly smoother and more luminous. The soft cream's transformative powers leave my complexion looking revitalized and refreshed, making it a must-have in my daily regimen.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

Its luxurious texture feels incredibly smooth and lightweight on the skin, yet it provides deep hydration that lasts all day. I was amazed by the immediate effects it had on my skin; not only did it leave my complexion feeling supple and revitalized, but I also noticed that a stubborn wrinkle between my brows seemed to diminish after using it consistently. This cream is definitely a skincare essential for anyone looking to achieve a radiant and youthful complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My ultimate favorite moisturizer paired with the toner HEAVENS SENT

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream by la mer is heavenly, a dream come true for dry skin, I love using it at nights, I wake up with a beautiful glow the day after, I can’t get enough. I have become a true la mer lover.

reviews.review_text: Definition of luxury. If you’re sensitive to fragrance this is NOT for you. The scent is potent but it smells incredible! I did wear makeup over it and my makeup looked incredible! It’s a good base for skin prep, however only use a small amount.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La mers moisturizing soft cream feels so luxurious whenever I put it on. I have tried all brands from tatcha to kiehls to Chanel to everything in between but my favorite has always been this one. Definitely worth the splurge

reviews.review_title: Hydrating moisturizer, decent scent but pricey!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product screams luxury! From the second I smelled it, it does have a decently strong scent, but it literally smells luxury! This is a very hydrating moisturizer, a little bit goes a long way, and for the price point, it might be good to start with the small size! I love the way it makes my skin feel, however I prefer to use it at night! I live in Florida so moisturizer like this suits me and my skin better for night vs. going out during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received two sample sizes of this moisturizer, and I have to say a little bit goes along way! This is one of the most hydrating moisturizers I have ever used. I have very sensitive, acne, prone skin, and had no issues with this moisturizer. I think for how effective the product is, it is definitely worth the price I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Due to the harsh winter weather, I recently got a windburn that I didn’t even know existed. So, I was looking for a gentle, hydrating cream that would heal and protect my irritated skin. As it says on the product name, it is a soft medium-weight cream. I just started using it, so I am not sure about the effects for wrinkles yet but overall I am happy with it. Also, it has a baby powder/cotton smell if anyone cares about the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift. The la mer cream makes my skin feel soft without leaving it looking or feeling greasy! a little of it goes a long way! it does have a heavy fragrance smell if that bothers you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this moisturizing soft cream! It makes my skin feel so smooth, soft and hydrated! Gives me the perfect flow and plump while keeping my youthful look. I love that it has ingredients like miracle broth, lime tea, and multi-sized moisture spheres.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is super moisturizing and gentle and the fragrance is not too heavy. It is also not super thick and great for sensitive skin types. I love the brightening effect it has with the skin-toned color. The price however, is outrageous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the definition of luxury. This cream is hydrating and smooth to the touch. My skin loves it and I am excited to see the long term effects after incorporating this in my routine for a bit. It is pricey but I get the hype

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: am so happy! Such a treat! I think I like the texture and smell of the moisturizer cream. I would definitely recommend to try a small size of the cream to make sure it is good for your skin type!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: WHAT A CREAM! This little sample size of La Mer is perfect for traveling and on the go. It keeps the skin moisturized and hydrated and it’s easy to just pick up and be on the go with. I can’t wait to get the large size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream will change your life! I love using it daily to make sure to treat my dry skin, and ease the fine lines. The name really makes sense as it refreshes your skin. I definitely recommend this product for all the sensitive skin babes out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Tried and true moisturizer that does al. You'd hope and expect out of a moisturizer. It really does revitalize your skin and get deep down to penetrate the moisture into your skin. I love how this makes my skin look and how soft it feels

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You can never go wrong with LaMer! This moisturizing cream is super light, soaks in beautifully into the skin and creates the perfect and happiest face ever! Incredibly soothing and above all moisturizing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite moisturizer. I wasn’t sure if it was going to be worth the hype but oh my goodness. It’s so hydrating and smells so good I’m absolutely obsessed with this and will be buying as gifts for everyone

reviews.review_title: great cream if you're willing to pay for it!
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream for a bit now and it is very hydrating, moisturizing, but definitely cannot justify the price of this product. If you're looking to splurge go for it but there are lots of great affordable options out there!  sent to me by la mer in exchange for an honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! It is not super heavy and it does not have a strong scent either. As someone with sensitive skin, I have to be careful what I put on my skin and I was so happy to know that this didn’t irritate my skin. It made my face feel so soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer The Moisturizing Cream is an absolute dream. It is so soft, and leaves my skin feeling so hydrated. I was dealing with dry skin throughout winter, and this cream makes it feel like I have a glossy protective layer on my skin without the sticky and greasy feeling!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Okay i am literally obsessed with this moisturizer from La Mer. Everything i have tried from them always feels so luxurious you really feel like you’re getting your money’s worth. This is my new go to moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the actual best! I never thought I would actually really like this but I’m obsessed the glow and moisture it gives is actually unreal! I can’t imagine mY makeup routine without it now! The absolute best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizing soft cream. It’s great for winter months, before I started using it my skin was super dry and irritated and now it’s so soft and hydrated. People have commented my skin looks amazing since I’ve been using it so that’s a big plus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream. It goes on very smooth and is not noticeable, it feels smooth and natural. I like how it doesn’t smell and easy to use. This product is also portable. I love throwing it in my bag.  I would definitely recommend to a friend

reviews.review_title: Buy it at Nordstrom in store

reviews.review_text: For 200 dollars I expect my product to be packaged better and more safely when it’s being shipped. Box showed up half taped losely, the package was upside down inside of the box with no protective anything.

This did not work with my skin. I usually have pretty resilient skin that isn’t sensitive to ingredients but there is something in this that turns my face red and starts to get irritated. It does have fragrance, so maybe that’s it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not worth the $200 for one ounce, makes skin dry for the after results. Has good instant reaction but that goes quickly goes away.

Love this the texture the smell everything wish it was more affordable

reviews.review_title: Why would you mess with perfection!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why did you have to reformulate La Mer!!!! The moisturizing soft cream was my perfect moisturizer, it left my skin smooth, hydrated, supple, and glowing. I don’t know what they did to this new version but I woke up with a forehead full of pimples after trying it. Why do thesebrands keep reformulatingsuxh amazing products just to follow stupid trends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La mer! La mer is the original face cream that has amazing benefits. I love how La mer soothes my irritated skin. I love using it at night time bc it is a little bit of a heavier cream. It is great for all skin types. I would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Can’t believe the price tag on this, the fragrance in it is so strong and off putting. Leaves my face super oily , it’s just not for me

reviews.review_title: It’s ok, but not worth the money.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin

(yes I followed the directions). Honestly, for the price, not worth it. I use Charlotte Tilbury Magic Cream and it’s just as good for half the price!! . Charlottes  it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this in the mail. Honestly I really enjoyed the cream, I felt as if it made my face feel tighter when applied and gives off a nice dewy complexion. The scent isn’t my favourite but the product itself is still good. If I was financially well off then I would see myself buying this product in a larger size but definitely cannot justify spending that much in my current financial state.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Honest, unsolicited review: I find this to be almost tue perfect moisturizer. I love the regular crème and this one is perfect for hot weather here in Florida. Light scent, absorbs easily, calms skin, ultra moisturizing. Just treat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received a sample size of this in the mail and first off, the excessive packaging the TINY trial size came in was ridiculous and offended me as someone who cares about environmental impact.  Now for the product itself: It smells, looks and feels just like your granny’s Olay moisturizer. I actually cannot get over the scent. So powdery and yuck. The cream itself is thick and took forever to absorb into my skin. I used it as a night cream and it was fine. But again, $14 Olay would do the same job for you. There is nothing whatsoever revolutionary or groundbreaking about this moisturizer! These reviewers should be ashamed carrying on that it is “the best,” etc. Certainly not. I’m willing to bet that perhaps one person in all of these reviews purchased the full sized product. Ludicrous price. I wouldn’t buy even if I was a billionaire. Spend your money on something better, like rent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from lamer. It is a great light moisturizer. I love how lightweight it is and a little goes a long way. Takes my skin from dry and rough to soft, dewy and smooth.  A little goes a long way so ypu don't need to use a ton and it will last you a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this! I use it every morning. I love the scent, because it's not too much. I also have very sensitive skin and have had zero break outs while using this. My skin feels smoother instantly and leaves a dewy look. I'm a fan. Gifted by la mer.
Best moisturizer in existence. Works extremely well at hydrating skin. After using this moisturizer once you won’t ever want to use another moisturizer again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer their Moisturizing Soft Cream Moisturizer and it is now one of my favorite moisturizers. It has an amazing lightweight texture that leaves my skin glowing. Plus, the scent is amazing - such a luxe and light smelling fragrance. I absolutely love this product.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little certainly goes a long way! Very lightweight texture and the before and after benefits are vast

I received two samples of this product to try as a complimentary from LAMER in exchange with my honest review.  I love this moisturizing cream! It really hydrates my skin and I love the light-weight texture.

Personally, I'd skip this purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love la mer products, so excited when i got gifted by la mer. This is a classic for a reason. It is on the pricier side but in my opinion it’s definitely worth the splurge. I use it all the time. Very creamy, luxurious. Love it so much!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the formula is luxurious and light weight. i started using it for my night time routine and my skin feels soooo soft and plump when i wake up. with this one, a little definitely goes a long way. 10/10! gifted by la mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer and I love this moisturizer!  I have really sensitive dry skin and it kept me hydrated and didn’t cause any flare ups on my skin. It also smells very clean and it’s not an overpowering scent. Definitely would recommend!

reviews.review_title: I'm excited to finally try this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am so in love with La Mer's Moisturizing Soft Cream! I applied it as the last step in my skincare routine and woke up the next morning with unbelievably soft and hydrated skin. It truly is a buttery and rich formula that only takes a small amount to do wonders for your skin. Best of all, it doesn't leave any greasy residue and can be layered with other serums and moisturizers. I didn't notice any pilling or anything unpleasant! The scent is light and not too heavy. If you're looking for something that is a little luxury for your daily life,  this is it! I received this product as a gift complimentary from LaMer but my opinions are 100% my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mar gifted me this moisturizer, and I knew I would like it right away. While incredibly lightweight, it is very rich and hydrating for my dry-combo skin. It really is a LOVELY cream! However, I am not sure I would repurchase for the price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin is naturally oily, but the lightweight texture of the Soft Cream help hydrate my skin and the overproduction of oil. A little goes a long way! Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin

It's rich and buttery, and just a dab goes a long way. Its thickness didn't leave any greasiness or residue, and I'm able to layer it under and on top of other serums and moisturizers. The price point is a bit steep for every day use, but it's the perfect little pot of luxury to add to my skincare routine when I want an extra little boost or my skin needs a serious refresh.  This product was gifted by LaMer in exchange for testing and giving honest feedback.

reviews.review_title: A staple for your skin care routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Lamer New Soft Cream Worth it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this cream consistently for the past week. It feels like a dream to finally dry a lamer product that was gifted to me by lamer to try out. I have seen so many high praises for the brand and always wanted to try it. Now let’s get into this cream. This is their new moisturizing soft cream. I have dry skin and loves lighter consistency products and this was exactly that. It is also said to be great for redness and helps with anti aging. My skin has also been visibly hydrated whenever I use this cream, and the next morning my skin still feels and look moisturizing. It has antioxidant ingredients which I love because it’s going to protect my skin against free radicals and environmental particles. This cream is so rich, but light at the same time and I love that a small amount goes a long way.

I was hesitant to try this cream but I received a jar complimentary from lamer, now I am hooked.  It's extremely hydrating but what is most surprising is how light weight the texture of the creme is.  My skin has been dry and flaky from the weather and after just a few uses, my skin was hydrated and dewy.  You only need to use a small amount as a little bit will go such a long way.   I'm amazed how much better my skin looks and how much nicer my makeup goes on after using the La Mer creme.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am truly blown away by this moisturizer!! My skin is the one thing I will over invest in and I truly think the hype is absolutely real with this product!! cannot wait to try other products from La Mer! #GiftedByLaMer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer’s new moisturizing soft cream feels so luxurious and silky on the skin. I love everything a out this cream. It is your next all in one cream. It helped with my wrinkles and gave my skin a nice radiant glow. I felt hydrated all day. If you are thinking hmmm is it worth it. The answer is yes, without a doubt!!!! Add to cart and thank me later! This was gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is amazing! A little goes a long way so remember that when applying. It left my skin feeling smooth and moisturized. After using it I feel like my skin is firmer and plumper which is great for my fine lines! This was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product as a makeup primer. It gives a beautiful glow to the skin and has a pleasant, lightweight texture. Just a tiny dab can cover an entire face. This was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer Moisturizer is a highly-regarded skincare product that is often praised for its effectiveness in hydrating and nourishing the skin. Made from a blend of rich ingredients, such as algae extract and shea butter, this moisturizer is designed to deeply penetrate the skin and improve its texture and appearance. I noticed noticeable improvements in their skin's elasticity and hydration levels, with many noting that it provides a luxurious, pampering experience. While La Mer Moisturizer is on the pricier side, I believe that it's worth the investment for its transformative results. Overall, if you're looking for a high-quality, effective moisturizer that delivers on its promises, La Mer Moisturizer is definitely worth considering. I received this product complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always impressed with the result I see with the La Mer moisturing cream. Love te texture it's nice and lightweight melts into my skin leaving it perfectly hydrated and soft. I love how my skin feels very nourished and lively after each use of this cream. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this product was gifted by Lamer! I am IN LOVE! this moisturizer is so light weight you could barely feel it on the skin, but so hydrating. I have chronically dry skin and I could tell after just one use how moisturizing it was! It smells fresh!

I had planned to use it again at night but by the end of the day my face was still fully moisturized. This is an all day, everyday cream that can honestly be used on elbows and knees too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Easy and hydrating on the skin!

Will definitely be keeping this as part of my morning and night time skin care routine.

I live in a humid climate and find that it remains feeling almost dewy if I wear it during the day.
