reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer a sample of this  NEW moisturizing soft cream. Two words: So luxurious. This is magic in a jar. It instantly quenches my dry/combo skin but doesn’t clog my acne prone pores. It leaves a gorgeous glow on your skin that lasts for hours. It’s also a great hydrating base for under makeup. I used a little under my eyes and my canceler has never looked better. The texture is so light-weight that you forget you have anything on.  After several uses I felt a noticeable difference in how plump my skin felt, it got its bounce back!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Smells very nice and feels super light on the skin. Perfect for under makeup or for a fresh face in the mornings. You do not need too much either, a little goes a long way. Really enjoyed it and will be using it often! Gifted by lamer.

After receiving my gift by La Mer I wanted to put the product to the test by incorporating it in both my skin care and skin prep routine. The skin instantly drinks the product up! I found that it works beautifully with serums. Immediately plumps and is exactly why I can understand the hype, 100% worth it. It’s giving luxury glass skin! Gratefully gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I think this cream is nice but not worth the price. It’s a little heavily fragranced for me, but is a just fine moisturizer. I would Gladly use up samples of it. It was gifted to me by La Mer but these are my honest opinions.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has been my holy Grail for the past few weeks. I absolutely love how I moisturize my skin doesn’t kick up with any make up and just overall amazing. It also doesn’t irritate my acne prone eczema skin I highly recommend. Gifted by la mer.
Absolutely loveeee!!! Makes my skin feel so soft and smooth on the high end price wise but so beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer Soft Cream was something I’ve had my eye on for a while - I received this complimentary from La Mer. My overall thoughts are that it’s lightweight, hydrating and you only need a very small amount. If you are sensitive to fragrance, I would stay away as it does have an intense clean baby powder like smell. It doesn’t not deter me from using it; just something to be aware of. Other wise, my skin does feel immediately soft and moisturized after use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this product complimentary of LA MER and asked to leave an honest review. Although the price is crazy high I can’t help but love this moisturizer. It’s super lightweight but a little packs a big punch. Skin instantly feels soft!

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted this product complementary from La Mer, I gotta say this product is so worth it, just a little goes a long way. You don’t need much to reap benefits. I noticed the difference in my skin just days after using this product. It’s formula is so lightweight & absorbs quickly still leaving a soft finish. Absolutely love!

reviews.review_title: Smells and feels amazing, price is not amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE the product itself. It has a very light scent to it. I received a free sample randomly in the mail ( I am NOT an influencer at all, barely use social media actually). I had planned on buying it but the price is absolutely outrageous. I have a very large disposable income but even I can't justify spending this much on a moisturizer. Would I recommend to a friend? Yes and no. The product truly is amazing but the price is just not worth it. I would actually feel guilty buying such an expensive product that only lasts so long, and this is coming from someone that literally spends thousands a year on fine jewelry for myself but that at least feels rare. This is just a moisturizer that can be replaced easily. I will not be buying. I feel like it should be a 1/3 or 1/4 of the price that it is. If the largest size was $150-$200 instead of nearly $600 I would be more inclined to purchase this product. This price is actually kinda disgusting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream has a lightweight texture, which makes it perfect for daily use. A little goes a long way, so you don't need to apply too much product to achieve the desired effect. After using this cream, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin's hydration levels. The cream also helped to improve the overall texture of my skin, making it feel softer and more supple. Got this cream as a complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this cream complimentary from La Mer and as a skincare enthusiast, I'm always on the lookout for products that deliver great results. And let me tell you, this moisturizer is one of them! What I love about this cream is its light-weight texture. It feels like a dream on the skin and doesn't leave any greasy residue behind. Plus, a little goes a long way, so it's perfect for those who don't want to use a lot of product. After the winter my skin was feeling so doll and dry! The product has provides intense hydration without feeling heavy on the skin 10/10 for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample, which was very cool. However, I cannot understand how anyone can justify the cost of this moisturizer. It’s overly priced by a landslide and actually made me break out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La Mer skincare! An ideal skincare regimen for the summer season. The texture of the cream is wonderfully soft and luxurious, with a lightweight feel overall. It provides the skin with healing moisture, helping it rebound with elastic firmness and a bouncy, youthful appearance.

reviews.review_title: Be Skeptical of Incentivized La Mer Reviews
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer has a very soft + comfortable texture that feels very moisturizing and nourishing on the skin. It also has a light floral marine scent that makes the application feel like a luxury experience. While those aspects are nice, the price is unjustifiable. I received this complimentary from La Mer in exchange for honest review but the brand literally gave influencers talking point suggestions to include in their reviews, so be very skeptical of anyone who was incentivized to give a review on this. Most brands do not do this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is sincerely my favorite moisturizer of all time. As a makeup artist and esthetician, I’ve tried them all, and this one cannot be beat. While all of the La Mer textures are fantastic for different reasons, I personally love the soft cream for my combo skin, because it’s super nourishing but light weight. My skin has been a little extra dry from using tretinoin, and my soft cream (gifted to me just as the right time) has completely rebalanced and calmed my skin down. The best!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer is one of those products that I never understood because of the pricing. I am happy that I was able to get my hands on a sample complimentary from La Mer because it kinda makes sense now. The formula just FEELS expensive. The scent is pleasant and it absorbs nicely. Is it still out of my price range? yes. But is it an excellent product that I’d recommend to those that can afford it? Also yes

I have been a huge fan of La Mer for years so I was very excited to try their Moisturizing Soft Cream when it was gifted by La Mer. I was very surprised by how truly soft it was and the overall lightweight texture. After using, my skin was noticeably smoother and softer. I'll definitely be using this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The soft cream feels luxurious. It is lightweight and a little goes a long way. It is fragrant, though I wish the smell was a little less strong. It's a nice and light moisturizer for a hot summer day but I wouldn't rely on this for the cold winters! Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was such a nice product to test out complimentary from La Mer! After using it every night for a week my skin was noticeably smoother and I felt like my face was so hydrated it didn’t hold on to face wrinkles. I love the texture and how it melts into the face without feeling greasy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is so hydrating and left my skin feeling so soft. I love the scent and the way it melts into the skin. The packaging is an added plus and I now need to purchase the bigger version because my skin has never looked better. This product was complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer does it again and are we surprised!? Unlike most lightweight moisturizers, this one is fully moisturizing even on the part of my face that has a minor eczema outbreak. While I received this moisturizer complimentary from La Mer, I would spend the money on my own especially with the VIB sale coming up. It's worth a try if you need a spring and summertime moisturizer that has a big impact without a super thick formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love these! These were gifted by La Mer for my honest review. They smell incredible - definitely in scented but have that fresh smell. They are super smooth and left my skin feeling incredibly soft. I think this is definitely a must have and a great addition to my everyday skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Mer. Such a luxe mosturizer! It just melts into the skin, leaving it soft and supple. I dont get to try expensive creams like this often, so this was such a wonderful experience! Once I finish other creams I have, I will consider purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really nice face cream. Very hydrating and I love the scent. I prefer Augustinus bader or dr. Dennis gross creams more, but this is a nice one if you want anti aging help. Not as great for acne prone skin. This was gifted by La mer in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted to me by La Mer and have really enjoyed it so far! This cream is light-weight and very moisturizing. Before using it my skin was super dry, but my skin felt so moisturized and had such a beautiful glow after using it even just one time! A little really goes a long way with this product too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this face cream!  You can feel the quality the first time you touch it.  It left my skin smooth and soft and my skin has no reactions to it at all.  It's completely fragrance free as well - so it's perfect if you have allergies or sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing soft cream complimentary from La Mer is so luxurious and hydrating for my face! Not only does it keep my skin hydrated, but it also feels more firm each time I use it. I love that it is filled with antioxidants and natural ingredients from the sea. A great luxury moisturizer for your skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer in exchange for an honest review. The biggest thing I will say about this moisturizer is that a little goes a long way. Like, you use barely any and your face is feeling very moisturized after. It’s not greasy by any means and the scent is okay. Not my fave smell, not awful. It’s a very clean smell. The moisterizer itself was light but also still rich and quenching to dry/combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me from La Mer. I honestly wasn’t sure how I was going to feel about this product after seeing the price tag… but wow. Thinking I’m going to need to invest in this very soon. The texture of this moisturizer is light weight and feels incredibly hydrating. Like my face drank a ginormous glass of water. Being someone that has incredibly sensitive skin, I appreciate its soothing and smoothing effects. Highly recommend investing in this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this product gifted by La Mer. Make sure you warm it up and pat it into the skin. It is hydrating and wakes up the skin like I have had yet to experience from a product. It's lightweight and not greasy. It's true moisture that you're looking for and your skin needs!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing amazing amazing! This stuff smells so good and my skin felt so soft after using! Unfortunately only had the trial size, so it didn’t last long, but I enjoyed using what little I had. Buttery smooth skin after using! This was gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_title: You will never go back to your old moisturizer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer. Before applying my skin was dull, my nose was dry, and a little flaky. After I applied this moisturizing cream, I kid you not my skin was instantly baby soft smooth. Moisture rushed back into my skin immediately. The texture is a light weight soft cream and melted into my skin flawlessly, leaving a subtle glow on my face. You do not need a lot of product to cover your whole face, a little bit does go a long way. And for the icing on the cake, the smell is very soft and fresh, giving luxurious!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: (Gifted by La Mer) I’ve been using this for the past two weeks and it’s worked WONDERS on my redness and irritation. It’s really lightweight which I love on my sensitive skin. You don’t need a ton of product either, a little goes long way! My skin used to be inflamed and bright red, this has calmed it significantly after only a few weeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer in exchange for a honest review. From my experience, this moisturizer is amazing for combination skin! The fragrance is subtle (think clean, baby scents) and the formula for this moisturizer is not greasy at all - it melts into my skin and my face feels plump, nourished, and soft. A little bit goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is very nice! It was gifted by La Mer in exchange for a review, and I definitely enjoyed it. A little goes a long way. It’s light weight but definitely rich at the same time somehow. It leaves my skin glowing and I haven’t had any breakouts from it, just healthy glowing skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed with this moisturizer that I was gifted from La Mer! Normally cream products sit on top of my skin where I can feel them all day, but this one was actually light weight and worked for my skin type! A little definitely goes a long way when using it. I used probably 2 pea sized amounts for my whole face. I don’t love the smell but liked the smoothness of my skin after application. Would I purchase this for the current price point? Probably not, but I would definitely use it if it were gifted to me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: How not to love La Mer.  I have tried La Mer before and really liked it. The texture of this NEW Moisturizing Soft Cream is very light weight and at the same time very hydrating.  Love that you just need a little to hydrate. I like to only wear this cream and on top of that my sunscreen, my skin feels very hydrated after wearing it. This was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product gifted by La Mer and I must say, this is hands down the best moisturizer I've used! The Moisturizing Soft Cream is super lightweight and hydrating. A little bit of product goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: The softest skin! I could do without the fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow now I understand the hype! This leaves my skin INCREDIBLY soft and smooth. It truly feels like a luxury experience! I still with they wound come out with a fragrance free option though. I’m not a fan of that powdery smell. This product was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A good cream , soft , not thin but not too thick consistency. I was using it for the last week. I love the gentle floral and and at the same time herbal scent. My skin doesn’t really have any issues and I’ve been using it mostly at night. Very moisturizing. Worth a try! gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer cream is lightweight and feels very hydrating, without leaving me feeling greasy. It sits really nicely under my makeup which is a huge plus. The only drawback for me is that it does have fragrance in it which my skin doesn’t always do well with.   This product was gifted to me by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it is so soft on the skin super smooth. It’s very expensive though. And you could probably find a moisturizer for cheaper.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I saw instant results after the first few times! I have super dry skin and this really brought my skin back to life

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted By La Mer. The texture of the product is very soft, it feels gentle on the skin, I wish that they give us a big package but it is way it is, it’s good for use it before the makeup cause it leaves your skin hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: * Gifted by La Mer for an honest review* I have been using La Mer products for over 2 years now and I have seen such great results that I was so excited to try the new soft cream! And once again I’m amazed! The price point is a little higher but a little can go a long way! The soft cream is so soothing when applied to skin. Also with having sensitive skin, this product gives me no problem!! Highly highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry and sensitive skin, The Moisturizing Soft Cream (gifted by La Mer) helped with both of these problem areas while lifting my skin. It left a silky finish that looked and made me feel very fresh and healthier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly a great moisturizer, I was very impressed that so little went such a long way. I have super dry and sensitive skin,  but this was very hydrating and lightweight a the same time. Definitely going to be using it all, only downfall is the price of course.. would not repurchase for that reason alone even though it is one of the best creams I've tried. gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I was gifted by La Mer and can’t wait to buy more. A little goes a long way & the smell is amazing. My skin soaked it up leaving me dewy. Very light weight texture which I really enjoyed! Makeup laid on top of it so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me for my honest review. It's such an indulgent cream and a little goes a long way. My skin is very dry and this really helped to hydrate it! It also feels softer and the smell is not overpowering, which is great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this La Mer cream, so iconic for a reason. Very light-weight and not overpowering smell. I am surprised how little I needed to use to feel completely moisturized. It felt pretty simple and nothing too crazy which is why it must be so timeless. So happy to have been gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This item was gifted to me by La Mer and it was my first time trying their products. I was pleasantly surprised! The texture is very lightweight but the cream left my dry skin feeling so moisturized. I really noticed the difference. I'm 48 and in perimenopause so my skin really needs some extra love. This was the perfect boost and it didn't clog my pores.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was gifted by La Mer. It smells lovely, is lightweight, but extremely moisturizing! Overall I really like it, though it's tough to get past the price point. It did give my skin a nice dewey glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La mer moisturizing facial cream is well balanced but not very hydrating for my combination skin. The application is smooth and the texture of the product was nice but the fragrance smell is not desirable for me. Overall the product left much to be desired. This product is was given complimentary from La mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. I was gifted by La Mer..I don't know if I can go back to my other moisturizers.. La Mer is a game changer. A little goes a longgg way and it just feels so good on the skin. I've only used it for a few days now and I can already see a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ok so my face was really dry after a couple days of drinking. It was sort of peeling. I decided to wash it and apply my gifted by La Mer moisturizer and wow!! It actually felt so good and was able to wear makeup on top. Wore it at night to help the peelings and the peeling stopped the next day. Super moisturizing and little goes a long way!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this stuff. I use it in combo with my daily routine. I would choose this over the regular moisturizing cream because the other is just too thick for my liking. As the name implies, it is a soft cream and it applies easily. I have several moisturizing creams to apply depending on the season or how my skin is feeling. I prefer to use this on hotter days, in the summer, or when I'm traveling somewhere tropical.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was given this complimentary from La Mer. This is a very light weight moisturizing cream that went on so effortlessly and kept my skin looking plump for hours. My favorite thing about this cream is that it is very lightweight and doesn't clog my pores.

reviews.review_title: The Best Moisture Retention so far
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Moisturizing Soft Cream was gifted to me by Lamer and here’s my thoughts. The cream delivered the best moisture retention I’ve ever experienced, my skin looked visibly plumper, healthier, firmer even 8 hours after using it. PROS- Intense moisture retention all day and hydrated skin CONS- Price $$$ and fragrances added Overall I recommend for anyone who isn’t sensitive to fragrances or extremely prone to breakout.

reviews.review_title: Glides on nicely and leaves a soft glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer. The cream glided on really nicely. It left my face with a soft glow and kept it moisturized for hours. The smell lingers, but it’s not overwhelming. It’s perfect for everyday wear, but I especially love it for night time. Would definitely recommend trying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. This luxurious skincare product is very hydrating and soothing to the skin. My skin felt plumped immediately while reducing the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. The texture is very light, and a little goes a long way. It is easily absorbed into the skin, and hydration is long-lasting without feeling heavy or greasy. This is a beautiful product for dry skin, especially on dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product its a life changer love how feels on the skin and the most important look so good on me and smells amazing i have dry patches but with this moisturizer get ride completely of them im so excited how my skin its changing on a good way with this product this was gifted by la mer

La Mer is amazing! complimentary from La Mer,  I loved the cream and it feels so great on the skin - perfect for sensitive skin like mine! Definitely worth the money and it leaves your skin feeling great with not too too much oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely my favorite moisturizer ever. it feels very lightweight and my face feels super hydrated after using. The moisturizer instantly makes my face glow and truly transforms my face. I received this product complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by la mer I have to say, La Mer Soft Cream is an absolute lifesaver for my skin. This fantastic cream is super hydrating and absorbs into my skin incredibly quickly, which is perfect for when I'm in a rush in the morning. One of the main benefits I've noticed from using this cream is that it has helped to reduce redness in my cheeks which often is noticeable after I cleanse. Plus, it has a lovely fresh scent that's not overpowering at all, which is always a bonus. Ultimately, I think this cream is a must-have for anyone looking to achieve beautiful, healthy-looking skin. It's definitely become a staple in my skincare routine, and I would recommend it without hesitation! The only thing is, it is quite expensive, but for self care and confidence i think its worth it. I'm 39 with dehydrated skin and a little rosacea.

reviews.review_title: Thick but blendable cream with lovely fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This facial cream is super thick but blends into the skin seamlessly and quickly without leaving any cast or residue. The texture is great. There is a very strong fragrance reminiscent of vintage cosmetics, and as my skin is sensitive, I was expecting it to make me break out, but in fact my facial skin did not react at all. Though I’d prefer a fragrance free formula, it turned out fine. The scent is actually quite lovely and makes this product smell as high-end as it is. This cream was gifted by La Mer for my honest review. Though I really like the formula, I don’t think I would repurchase the product myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La mer is so Lux and I always feel like I’m treating myself when I use this moisturizer. It’s a very light weight moisturizer but really sinks in and glides across the skin very easily. It’s not thick at all.  Feels more like an expensive serum.  I usually use about a nickels worth of product for my whole face. It works as very nice skin prep before make up as well because it doesn’t feel like it’s clogging your pores or masking your skin. Just enhancing. If you can afford it, it’s lovely! This was given to me complimentary from La mer.  The price point was a shock so this is for the rich girlies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by la mer It has great texture, it's not greasy, it does a good job.  I'm using it on an area where it needs to regenerate and if I've seen results, I should definitely get the large size so I can tell if my skin has fully regenerated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer and although it’s pricey I did notice a difference in my skin! A little goes a long way with the product so even a small amount would last you a long time! Even after one use my skin felt completely softer. A product has never made my skin feel as soft as this did!

reviews.review_title: New addition to my skincare routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a moisturizing cream. I noticed an improvement on my redness, happy it did not beak me out. The formula is lightweight yet lux. My skin absorbed immediately and left no sticky residue, which Ioved. This cream was gifted by La Mer, which I thank them for introducing me to this amazing formula which I have purchased the full size now!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Grateful to try this complimentary from La mer. Ive always loved this brand and this product is no exception. These were super cute samples.  love the little tie bag it came in.  The bag will definitely be reused and repurposed. This is a Super hydrating cream. Left my skin very moisturized and absorbed well and quick into the skin.

reviews.review_title: A great hydrating moisturizer for summer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to be a La Mer gal. The coveted moisturizer was on my wishlist for months after trying a friends. I am so impressed by this new Soft Cream Moisturizer that I received complimentary from La Mer.  It leaves your skin feeling totally hydrated. I like that it is almost  bouncy, and light enough to wear as a primer. I think this is making my makeup application even better than the moisturizers I have used in the past. Velvety, luxurious, and a little goes a long way. I do find the scent a bit strong, but it doesn’t linger long past application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little bit definitely goes a long way. My skin needs a little more hydration during this season. It’s been over 5 hours and my face still feels smooth and moisturized. The cream’s texture is very light-weight and soft. Good for all skin types. #GiftedbyLaMer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this moisturizer. It is pretty light in consistency and melts right into the skin. I’ve used a heavier La Mer moisturizer before and prefer this one which was gifted by La Mer. The only thing to watch out for is that it is almost too good at absorbing into the skin so you have to be careful when picking up product and rubbing it with your fingers. I’d recommend using a metal spatula to scoop and place the product on your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer gifted me this product in exchange for a honest review. I was so excited to try this luxury moisturizer. I applied it in the evening. It has a nice consistency and left my skin feeling hydrated in the morning. Unfortunately, I prefer moisturizers that are fragrance-free/unscented. This formula seemed to have a floral scent that isn't for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La mer is so luxurious! This moisturizer is so hydrating! It truly is luxurious. It doesn’t feel too heavy or greasy. It really melts into the skin and keeps skin hydrated all day long. There is a smell to it but it is subtle and smells lovely! Complimentary from La Mer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Received it as complimentary from La Mer. I'm 29 years old with dry skin on face, was trying this cream today and love the results. My skin stays hydrated for hours after applying it, and I like the light-weight texture of the cream, and the soft smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been gifted this cream by La Mer. This is my honest opinion in using this La Mer cream for the last 11 days and I am obsessed. My skin is noticeably smoother, clearly and just feels amazing. I wish I could use and have this cream forever. I can only say great things about it!  #giftedbylamer

reviews.review_title: A hit…. But a miss at the same time!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Is this real life!? I was lucky enough to receive samples of this product complimentary from La Mer and let me tell you- this is so smooth and luxurious that I feel like I princess.   However, for the money it isn’t necessarily worth it there are many other products on the market that are just as good!  If you can swing it- treat yourself but don’t feel like you HAVE to have it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Laura merrier gifted me this moisturizer and I am so glad I get to try this luxurious product I’ve hear so many ppl talk about . Overall, Laura Mercier's Soft Healing Moisturizer is a great option for those with dry or sensitive skin who are looking for a gentle and effective moisturizer to soothe and nourish their skin.  Honestly I can see why people love it 10/10 would recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: complimentary from La Mee  For the first time I tried La Mer cream, I liked its light texture.  it is also easy to apply on the skin, lie down very easily and beautifully, gives a glow effect.  nourishes the skin and makes it hydrated.  fits perfectly before applying makeup, I have combination skin and I liked this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Does it work? Yes. Is it worth the money? No. I got a free sample of this moisturizer and it works very well but I could not see my self actually purchasing this product for that price point. There are better cheaper options. Gifted by la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Words cannot describe how amazing this brand is and how awesome this product is! The level of hydration that you get after one use it’s actually unreal! It is so worth the price point because it truly does work well! Gifted by la mer

reviews.review_title: This is a great moisturizer but!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the La Mer Moisturizer and I had to ask myself would I purchase this product with my hard earned money. This is a great nourishing moisturizer that is light weight. The La Mer Moisturizer is not oily, it leaves the skin hydrated and plump. The price range for this moisturizer is a little outrageous but the actual product is really nice. If it’s out of your budget you can find something that does just as good if not better for a cheaper price range. 7/10 for me I likely will not purchase myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was able to try this via a sample and a little goes a long way! It's very rich but lightweight, creamy and moisturizing and love the feel and smell. I like to use it in the areas where I am most dry so I get the most benefit from it! complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_title: Feels great, but fragrance is irritating

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this moisturizer! This was gifted by La Mer and I was so excited to try it! My initial reaction was 'wow a little goes a long way!' - super soft and hydrating. Very light-weight texture. I have only been using it for a few days and so far I really am enjoying it. I would like to keep trying for at least a month to see how my skin really interacts with the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The best moisturizer EVER. A little bit goes a looong way so you don’t need much to really lock the moisturizer in. I use it in the mornings and when I remove my makeup at the end of the day I still feel my have is very moisturized which is just amazing! Overall this is a holy grail moisturizer!! “Gifted by La Mer”

reviews.review_title: It’s good, but the price isn’t great!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: “gifted by La Mer” I’ve been dying to try this product for so long and finally was able to. For me, the price is a little steep. I have found products that work just as good on my skin for less. But, it is a great moisturizer and hope to see more benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this products! I was gifted by La Mer and I want to repurchase though pricey I enjoyed the consistency of this moisturizer! For sure a favorite from me and I would recommend to anyone that wants a quality product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It’s travel size product from Lamer - the soft cream . I received this cream complimentary from La Mer  This product with very gentle structure and nice smell. I using this cream as like a daily cream and sometimes using before make up . I recommend this cream !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by Le Mer. This cream has a Soothing texture and leaves a luminous finish. The scent kind of reminds me of ponds cream but the feel is nice and silky. I put it on my skin and I was surprised my skin immediately drank it up. It feels cool when you put it on which can be refreshing after a hot shower. I really like the luminous glow that it gives.

Could it get any more luxe than this? Gifted by La Mer, the gold standard of skincare. I adore this cream and how thick and hydrating it is. It has kept my skin plush on the driest of days! Well worth the investment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So the gifted by la mer sample sizes were really small for my taste to be able to really get a long enough use out of them to see how they could affect my skin long term but I’ve heard it does well w sensitive skin and i had no irritation so that was a great sign. This cream is hydrating and luxurious it feels really nice to the touch and in application. It does soak in pretty seamlessly to the skin which is cool. Works great before makeup too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There’s a reason this stuff is so famous. My skin was super dry after a lot of traveling and this cream was a miracle worker!! I’ve always wanted to try this cream but because of the price I couldn’t justify it. Thankfully La Mer gifted me and now I totally see what the hype is about. It’s definitely pricey but it is so hydrating. I’m interested to see how it will tackle fine lines/ wrinkles but in terms of hydration it’s a 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

I will continue to use it for 2 more weeks (I’ve used it for 2 weeks as of now) and see if that changes things. I think it’s still a good moisturizer, I just haven’t seen a HUGE difference in my skin like I was expecting

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin tends to feel tight/dry, but the NEW Moisturizing Soft Cream gifted to me by La Mer has changed that. It feels super lightweight yet genuinely long-lasting. The best part? A little goes a long way! I will not be taking it out of my rotation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff leaves my skin feeling hydrated and glowy! I use tretinoin every other day and it dries my skin out like crazy so pairing it with this product is perfect. It smells amazing and you only need a tiny amount of product. It definitely reminds me a lot of Nivea’s cream but less greasy. Complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by La mer for review and this has been amazing! Alittle but of product goes a long way and it’s very lightweight while still being moisturizing. Perfect for spring and summer! I usually have dry skin, and this has worked out for me with no dry patches.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Skin feels soft and hydrated, and I have really dry skin!This is a light cream that will be great under makeup and for a hot summer, This was gifted by La Mer and I cant wait to buy the full size of the cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was incredible for my dry skin as someone who is constantly searching for a moisturizer that will last me throughout the day and not leave dry patches this one did an incredible job and I would truly recommend it to anyone! reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been knowing La Mer for a little while (over 7 years prob) and when I was gifted by La Mer this new moisturizer cream I was eager to know what the deal was. The only thing to note is that the smell does wear off which in my case, I am happy as I like odorless creams.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: LA MER Never disappoints. From the quality to the smell I really enjoy this product. I feel like my face looks rejuvenated and hydrated. I certainly getting this product again! I have tried this brand products before so I was very excited to try a new one! I got it gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so hydrating - it leaves your skin feeling silky smooth. I love the texture and the incredible results. It’s a great product and I would order it again! It’s so good. It was Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. Overall, this cream is everything! Such an awesome product that visibly provides results.  In 8 weeks, pores & lines are visibly softened away and in 12 weeks, deeper wrinkles & folds appear reduced and skin takes on a more even tone, for an overall more ageless look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream, gifted to me by La Mer! It makes my skin feel so hydrated and smooth, while also not having an overbearing scent! I apply this as my last step in my morning and nighttime skincare routine and have definitely noticed a change in my skins texture!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice light everyday moisturizer gifted by La Mer. I’ve been wanting to get my hands on this since I saw Jeffery Star using it and so far so good. I like that it doesn’t have much of a scent and my skin feels and looks moisturized before make up.

I noticed I was a little more oily during the day (4+ hours into wear) in these areas when using this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: The only drawback is the price
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

It is super popular and it truly is so worth it. The only problem is that it is very pricey. But the product and formula itself is very moisturising.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is a game changer! It is worth the hype. This product was gifted by La Mer but have purchased before and am a big fan. You only need a little bit as just a small amount of product goes a lot way. I love that the super light-weight texture and how smooth my skin feels after.  I swear your makeup also looks better when you apply this moisturizer prior.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. This is a forever loved brand since my mom used to use it when I was just a young girl. And now I get to show my daughter how to use it. Loved how moisturizing this cream is. Feels very luxurious. Will definitely buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Must have for smoother younger skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I find that using it once a day is all I need and it leaves my skin looking so dewy to the point where I only need minimal makeup that day! I was fortunate enough to have this gifted to me as a complimentary gift from La Mer, which allowed me to try a product that I normally wouldn't consider.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I use this every morning, a small amount goes a long way.  Although, the price range is definitely out of my price range and there are definitely moisturizers out there that are cheaper and do exactly the same

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin

It isn't over powerful or anything!  Giving 4 stars just because of how expensive it is! A little unrealistic.  *complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: (Btw I was gifted by la mer) BUT I love what la mer does for my skin. As someone living in socal I’m always worried about dry and sun damaged skin but la mers cream keeps my skin looking so so amazing. I mostly use it at night as the final step in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

This item was gifted by La Mer for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

This container will last me quite a while! And I’m so happy with the results; my skin felt immediately nourished and hydrated, and the next morning (after applying at night), my skin was glowy and smooth. Adding this to my repertoire!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream proves to me why everyone loves La Mer!  I received this cream complimentary from La Mer.  I was so thrilled to finally be able to try such a luxurious product.  My skin was in desperate need of hydration and this cream delivered it in spades.  I’m so impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I will note that it has quite a flowery scent, which I refrain from buying products that aren't scent-free, but the smell isn't too potent. I love this moisturizer and will continue using it in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer is one of the top names in skincare, and it's easy to see why.  The Moisturizing Soft Cream has such a rich feel on the skin and is practically weightless. It makes my skin feel amazing, and it takes just a small bit to moisturize my whole face and neck area. Gifted by LaMer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so let me tell you about the La Mer moisturizing soft cream, it's seriously amazing! The texture is super hydrating, and it leaves your skin feeling sooo smooth and soft. Plus, it smells really fresh and absorbs super fast, so you can use it morning or night without feeling greasy. And can we talk about how it makes your skin look firmer and more elastic? It's like a little pot of magic, I'm telling you! My skin felt hydrated the whole day after my first application and I noticed it was great to wear under makeup as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and have found some pretty good products at a much lower price point than this so I was a bit skeptical about the value it would provide for my skin. To start, a little goes a long way with this and it’s very long lasting so I can see the price point being justified. I’m not a fan of it having scent since by now most of us know scented skincare can be irritating. I have been using it for a few days though and can see an improvement in my texture and moisture. My skin feels a bit more supple & I haven’t been having dry patches for a few days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this product makes my face feel! I have very sensitive skin, and this made my face feel buttery soft and smoothed the skin so nicely. Definitely can tell it’s a high quality made product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer. The mini product was small so I was worried I wouldn’t be able to use it long enough so see how I liked it but a little goes a LONG way! VERY hydrating, I thought it was a little oily at first but absorbs & dries beautifully. I tried it on it’s own & then another time with oil after like my normal routine. My skin feels so soft & hydrated! This stuff is great but can’t say this is something I’d repurchase because of the price. Works amazing though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I swear this changed my skin in a week! I was struggling with flakiness, irritation and dryness and it’s almost completely gone! My skin looks and feels so much healthier. It’s so lightweight but a little goes a long way for me. Needless to say, I’m hooked!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is ideal for the winter period for my combination skin. My skin was moisturized throughout the day and even after washing my face was not dry. No acne problems after using this cream. Continue to use and follow the result.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was free and it was my First time trying this moisturizer and it did not dissapoint. I love how velvety and smooth the formula is. It is definitely very rich and nourishing. I recently came back from the beach and my skin was so dry. I kept applying this daily and it really help transform my skin back to normal. Def recommend if you’re looking for a hydrating and rich moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great moisturizer leaves my skin feeling amazing and refreshed clean formula with amazing skin benefits. Provides a great foundation for my makeup and a great addition to my routine goftes by le mer skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve always wanted to try this product to see if it lives up to the price point. When applying on the face it feels super creamy, thick and almost silky on the skin. However I really can’t get past the smell, almost smells like a baby product. I loved how my skin felt but I can say I wouldn’t reach for it over and over

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is gifted by La Mer. This is the most hydrating moisturize I have ever tried. A little bit really does go a long way and will last a long time. It makes my skin feel very light and hydrated. I use this morning and night and it’s the perfect addition to my skin care routine.

reviews.review_title: An amazing addition to my anti-aging routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a long time La Mer lover and have enjoyed their powder, foundation, creme de la mer, the concentrate (helped heal a 2nd degree burn I had), and more.  This is no exception! This formula is so lightweight, and the littlest bit goes a LONG way.  It feels incredibly nourishing and does a great job at making my skin feel hydrated all day long.  It plays well under makeup, and I feel like it provides a supple quality to my skin that I've been slowly but surely losing as I approach 40.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this cream moisturizer! It’s perfect for my skin during the drier months of the year. When I put it on after doing other parts of my skincare regimen my skin visibly looked more refreshed and soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One thing I can say is a little goes a long long way. I'm normally very heavy handed when it comes to moisturizer applications but not with this. Which is great! The moisturizer is very light weight and my skin feels amazing even through a new York winter. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this moisturizer is definitely a luxury novelty product. the first ingredient isn’t water & i can tell because the moisture isn’t super long lasting. honestly i wouldn’t restock this item because i’ve had other moisturizers, for less, perform much better. [gifted by La Mer]

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a small sample of this moisturizer. It is very rich and hydrating and doesn’t leave me feeling too oily. The only think I have to say is that it is heavily fragrances. It is a nice scent but it irritated my sensitive skin a bit.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: One of, if not my favorite moisturizing creams out there! La Mer is like no other. I love the way my skin feels after using this product. If you haven't given it a try yet, it is definitely a must. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really hydrating. The algae definitely helped with some of the redness I had. It feels light weight with out any oily residue. The scent is not bad or strong. I used it under my make up and it helped give a more smoother base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was OK but for the price I think I expected A LOT. It was hydrating and lightweight but I question how it is so simple, as I have less expensive moisturizers that are capable of doing the same thing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Just what my skin needed. Lamer gifted me this product and I couldn't be more in love with it. After been using it for a week my skin feels like porcelain again , smooth and glowing .Recommended 100% . Don't walk , run and get it

reviews.review_title: Definitely a product to add to your routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive La Mer Soft Cream. The little pouch it came in was so cute too! Using this cream I noticed that a little comes a long way. The texture of the cream is so lightweight on my skin. Before I used the product my skin looked dull and after I applied the cream my skin was glowing. I thought my skin was going to counteract with the scent of the cream but it didn’t.

reviews.review_title: Great when climate changes effect your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is a life saver. The climate dramatically changed after being super hot for a month. Now it’s cool and my skin started peeling on my face. Once I added this to my face routine I didn’t see any peeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer never disappoints! I cleansed using the La Mer cleansing foam and then followed up with the soft cream. Amazing!! This moisturizer is creamy and lasts all day.  The scent is light and fresh. My skin feels soft but not greasy or heavy. I have already ordered more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed is an understatement!!! This is my holy Grail brand and I love everything they make in this product is no exception. It feels so amazing and very luxurious. 1000/10 definitely going to be using my every day routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really good moisturizer, leaves my skin super soft and hydrated. I feel like my skin loves this formula. I’ve been using it for two weeks and haven’t noticed much change in fine lines but I have to give it more time. For the price tag I’m not sure it’s worth it, but nonetheless it’s a good product if you want to splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I have been wanting to try for awhile and I'm happy that I did. It made my skin feel very soft and hydrated, while also giving me a glow. I will definitely buy this full size when I run out. Gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_title: Awesome product but the price is insane
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Was gifted by La Mer in exchange for an honest review.  The cream is sooo smooth and lightweight, left my skin feeling incredible. HOWEVER, the price is insane. If you want to splurge, its a great product and I understand the hype, but you do not need to spend this much on a moisturizer.

reviews.review_title: Nice cream, but not for winter
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer cream was nice for my skin, but I think it would be best suited from my dry-dehydrated skin in the spring/summer time. It goes on light and hydrates, but being in cold/windy temperatures of the city I just needed a little bit more nourishment. This product was giftd by La Mer in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer’s moisturizing soft cream feels so luxurious on my skin. It is very light-weight and applies nicely. Keep in mind, a little definitely goes a long way! I love using this after completing my skincare routine during the day and at night. My skin immediately feels more hydrated and plump. I absolutely love this cream and cannot recommend it enough!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This moisture cream is so very soft on my skin when applied. I got immediate result of silky smooth skin. I love how a little goes a long way and my skin doesn’t feel oily. I also soaks in and gives an amazing healthy glow to the skin. It is a little spendy but it definitely last awhile.

reviews.review_title: If you want to spend the money...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mer. This cream is so buttery and smoothe. It really left my skin glowing! It does have a scent that I don't particularly care for. The price is just crazy- honestly no cream is truly worth this amount of money. BUT if you want to splurge, it definitely does feel nice and left my skin super soft.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Personally this moisturizer didn’t work for me. I have extremely dry skin and I didn’t find this to be hydrating enough. I had to follow it up with a skin oil and for the price this should be enough on its own. I’d say give it a try if you have oily/combo skin but if you’re on the dry side you might want to save your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very moisturizing and does not leave your skin with any greasy residue. For the price point I was expecting it to have a better smell. It smelt like a very traditional lotion. It did leave my skin feeling buttery soft though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love La Mer, but that being said, the price point is absolutely insanely. It's definitely a great moisturizer, my skin feels hydrated and non-greasy, but I think there are so many other great moisturizers on the market at a fairer price point. I personally wouldn't buy this with my own money. This product was gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m loving this moisturizer!! It’s very lightweight so it’s great for my oily/combo skin. It’s very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling so soft. It is very pricey but it’s definitely worth it! Also, a little goes a long way, so it lasts a good amount of time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally tried this for the first time and it has quickly become one of my all time staples in my skincare routine. The moisturizer feels so luxurious and keeps my skin feeling hydrated the entire day. It’s lightweight and applies beautifully under my makeup. It smells wonderful and a little bit does a really long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this moisturizer complimentary from La Mer. This is a great moisturizer and a little definitely goes a long way. It doesn’t go on greasy and is light weight. Not a thick moisturizer at all. Not much of a scent either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this for the first time and never looking back. It’s officially becoming a staple in my skincare routine. The la mer new moisturizing soft cream is hands down my favorite moisturizer. It feels so luxurious going on my skin, smells incredible, and keeps my skin more hydrated than any other cream has! couldn’t recommend it more highly. Way to go, La Mer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: light-weight texture but very moisturizing. I have very dry and dehydrated skin but this works so well. A little goes a long way. I have tried so many moisturizers and this one is the best I have tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted by La Mer and I love it! It’s lightweight and goes on under my makeup nicely! I love how smooth it makes my dry skin feel! I like to make a bottle last, so I’m glad a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing soft cream is just that!! Nice and rich but still lightweight on the skin. My skin feels hydrated and soft making it a perfect base for my makeup. There is a powdery fragrance to it. Just be aware if you are sensitive to fragrance! Overall, this is a great cream and a little goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Oh wow, this stuff is great.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a LONG way with this cream!  It is lightweight with lasting hydration, unlike other lightweight creams that I’ve tried. It took my skin from dry to moisturized and SO SOFT.  My skin actually held the moisture from this cream. I received this as a gift and will definitely repurchase!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La mer lives up to the hype with this amazing cream. I was able to try this out for free and I couldn’t be more happy. It’s light weight, smells wonderful, and is very pretty on the skin. I’m so happy I was able to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A luxurious rich cream that feels light weight upon application. I have dry skin so my skin soaks this stuff. After it has fully absorbed into my skin, it feels hydrated and prepped for makeup. It doesn’t leave a heavy oily finish; just a nice suppleness. This brand can be a little pricey but if you’re in the mood to treat yourself, this moisturizer is thee one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with the La Mer moisturizing soft cream. It is a lightweight textured cream and left my face feeling soft, plump and moisturized. I will say, a little definitely goes a long way. This will be incorporated into my daily routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time La Mer fan I was so excited to try the new soft cream and boy does it impress. I love how little I have to use and how light weight the cream is for how well it moisturizes. So happy I tried the soft cream! Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using the La Mer brand. The NEW Moisturizing Soft Cream is very nice. It has a nice, light fragrance and moisturizes well. The consistency is a little more than light. My skin felt hydrated without being overly greasy. No breakouts noted and I have sensitive skin. I received the product as a gift, complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This crème is really amazing it give my skin a beautiful satin glowy finish & I absolutely love how my skin looks after I apply this crème. The smell is very powder fresh so if you don’t like that fragrance be aware… overall I really love this moisturizer & can’t wait to keep using this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m in love with the new Lamer face cream! I’ve been a user of their eye cream for a long time and this face cream works magic for patchy dry skin like mine. It keeps my skin moisturized without feeling oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest review. The reformulated Moisturizing Soft Cream from La Mer is absolutely amazing. Not only does a little go a long way, but this lightweight textured cream gives my dry skin lasting hydration. From an ingredient standpoint, the formula is also much more interesting and innovative - so I really applaud La Mer for this updated take on a beloved classic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love how hydrating and moisturizing this cream is! it’s pricey but definitely luxurious and it works well in winter as well. i have really dry skin and this leaves me hydrated and my skin feels plump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am OBSESSED with the la mer moisturizer. It is truly worth every penny. It left my skin feeling soft, clean, and moisturized and when i woke up the next morning my skin was bright and smooth. I highly recommend this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My new favorite moisturizer! It applies so smoothly on my skin, has a fresh scent and absorbs quickly into the skin. It is so hydrating and a little goes a long way! This is going to a staple in my skincare routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best moisturizer I’ve used so far! My skin feels hydrated and fantastic! Yes this is expensive but trust me it’s worth every penny! It smells delicious and love the consistency, so thick and creamy!!

reviews.review_title: Lovely texture and my skin is loving it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! I can definitely feel how my skin has much improved since starting to use this La mer moisturizer soft cream. it goes on super lightweight, feels nice on my skin - not sticky, no oily or shiny skin after applying. Just nice, super soft & moisturized skin. This has been my salvation during this winter and I do plan to keep using this cream year round. Super pleased with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product is so boujie. It smells really good and feels like silk on the skin. Definitely tapping into my quality skin care investment era. It feels very protecting without feeling heavy or like I’m going to smear product on everything. In love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this moisturizer was middle of the road for me. It has a very thick consistency but doesn’t provide a lot of moisture, so I feel it’s not enough for dry skin. It just soaks in quickly and feels like nothing is there. The ingredient list definitely doesn’t justify the cost, I don’t want to see Petrolatum as the third ingredient if I’m paying $380 for 2oz.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As a long time fan of La Mer, I was thrilled to be gifted this product by the brand. It is just as amazing as I remember…the lightest texture, but a little goes a long way, so it really will last. My skin is so dry from city/desert air, and I immediately feel relief from that with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving this moisturizer! A little definitely goes a long way with this product and it goes on like butter. It has amazing ingredients that make my skin instantly feels hydrated and plump. I've been using for 2 weeks and am already seeing a difference. Complimentary from la Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer moisturizing soft cream product is incredibly lightweight on my skin. I have very sensitive skin and have had zero breakouts since beginning to use this product. Even after trying several other luxury brands, this will be my go to due to the benefits and lack of issues I've experienced. It has a slight sweet but pleasant smell and is incredible soothing on my skin. I have been using it as my exclusive skin product when I get out of the shower and have cleansed my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this absorbed into my skin. Didn’t leave an oily residue! There’s a slight scent to it that reminds me of sunscreen so if you don’t mind that then this should be fine. I probably wouldn’t buy this in the future, given the price point but it is a nice luxurious brand if you’re willing to splurge!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is, by far, my favorite formula yet! I’ve been a fan of the Treatment Lotion and Eye Balm Intense for years. I honestly don’t know why I never tested the moisturizers before. This is so silky and luxurious, which really enhances the user experience. In terms of benefits, I do feel like the blend of Miracle Broth, Shea, and plant oils keep my skin feeling hydrated and have soothed my inflammation. I’m acne-prone, so I can’t use this every night, but it’s phenomenal for special occasions or when I want to pamper myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer definitely lived up to the hype! First off, it has a very pleasant scent that a lot of “unscented” lovers wouldn’t mind. The product was creamy, extremely moisturizing, light/yet fulfilling and a little went a long way! Though this is a pricey moisturizer, you definitely get more bang for your buck. OH, and it leaves your skin dewy, firm and bouncy! You’ll have everyone asking for your skincare routine with this one ☺️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample and was super excited because I heard great things about this cream. One of the things I love about it is that it has a very light texture, absorbs very well, and hydrated my skin all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La mer gifted me the new moisturizing soft cream and after a few uses I can say that the product is actually very soft. Looks and feel luxurious however it’s not quite moisturizing it stays on for a minute then feels like nothing is on your skin. Depends on the amount use or the way you use it will leave a white finish. It’s a nice luxurious skincare product to add to your skincare shelf but you would be using it often than what should because it does not give a consistent moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pricey, but definitely moisturizes your skin! A little goes a long way with this product, so a thin layer really leaves you skin supple and hydrated. It pairs well under makeup after your morning skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most hydrating and light weight moisturizer i’ve ever used. I love that a little goes a long way. My skin feels so moisturized and supple after application. Definitely recommend. complimentary from la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I put this cream under my eyes before I went to sleep and when I woke up in the morning my skin looked so fresh there! It looked so soft. I am 25 and I don’t have lots of wrinkles, but the skin under my eyes is very thin and dark. This I felt added some moisture to the area and helped it thicken up in some way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I’m obsessed with how soft and smooth my skin looked after using this product! This moisturizer was so hydrating and nourishing on my dry skin. It left my face with the prettiest glow while being lightweight and non greasy! Loved it! Highly recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes
reviews.review_text: a little goes a long way, with intensive moisture all the way! this is what my skin needs as i’m starting to get fine lines on my forehead and have an 11 wrinkle. this locks in moisture all day so those wrinkles and fine lines don’t get dried out or irritated. non-greasy, not heavy, yet oh so heavenly! i wish i could bathe in this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer The Moisturizing Soft Cream Moisturizer is a must have for a skincare routine. It is very soft and hydrating. It is not heavy. Put it on morning and night. It makes your face feel fresh. I highly recommend this moisturizer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes it’s a very expensive cream but the results are amazing. I have been using it for a few months and it hydrates my skin so well. It doesn’t leave a sticky feeling on your face. Highly recommended this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LaMer, this moisturizer is amazing. I received small sample size of the cream and I really enjoyed it so far. It has made my skin feel velvety smooth and very hydrated. I love that there was no irritation on the skin and it maintained it’s moisture for hours! Love the top ingredients also: Miracle Broth™: Infuses skin with sea-sourced renewing energies to strengthen skin's barrier. - Lime Tea Concentrate: Contains antioxidants to protect skin from irritation due to environmental stressors. - Giant Sea Kelp: Support’s skin’s natural healing process.
