This cream is lovely! It’s so moisturizing and it sits very well under makeup- makes my makeup look very dewy and not dry. I would definitely recommend giving it a try, I’ve been loving it so far!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was a complimentary from La Mer to try for a review. First off, I have to note how much I absolutely love these tiny little sample minis they’re so cute! This cream feels so rich and luxurious. A little goes a long way.  It’s such a thick moisturizing texture and perfect for winter months where your skin is extra dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: You do not need much when using this moisturizer! This cream is very lightweight and helps smooth out my skin! I love it!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this light weight moisturizer. After a long day, I did my skincare routine and used a small amount of the moisturizer and my skin was glistening so beautifully! I would totally recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this but it was so heavily fragranced that it bothered my skin. It’s surprising considering the price. It’s a fine moisturizer but it’s nothing special. Sorry La Mer this was a la miss.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The La Mer moisturizing cream is the best in the game!! I tried it once and have been in love with it ever since. It’s perfect alone or before your makeup routine. I have dry skin so this cream leaves my skin feeling perfectly hydrated. It has a light clean scent and it doesn’t feel thick upon application. Seriously my favorite cream!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Here I was all happy with my long time moisturizer when I was gifted some samples complimentary from La Mer. I will never recover and neither will my bank account. The lightweight creamy texture and luxurious smell are seriously an experience not to be matched. My skin has never felt so fresh and dewy and I'm bummed because I seriously can't afford this every day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: WOW just wow. I have no words. Now I understand the hype. This cream is everything I ever wanted and more. Super creamy, leaves the skin looking amazing and it doesn’t my skin irritated or whatsoever.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have very dry skin and this cream leaves my skin feeling soft and hydrated. A little goes a long way and I love that it doesn’t feel greasy and feels very light weight. Before trying this cream I struggled to find the perfect moisturizer for my skin that didn’t break me out or make my skin feel dry. I totally would splurge on this cream.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I truly love how this cream makes my skin feel! It's lightweight but super moisturizing. Gets rid of any dryness and leaves my face super soft.  I use it at night and in the morning! Makes a great base for makeup too! I received this complimentary from la mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Complimentary from La Mer  Mind blown is an understatement. I was not prepared to fall in love with such an expensive moisturizer but I can never use anything else like this again. The quality is so thick and it melts away into the skin. When I wake up, I'm still glowing and moisturized for hours. An investment worth making.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! I had very high expectations and they were met since I already love the brand. The feel is very light and smooth on my skin and I cannot wait to use this in my daily ski care routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received tiny samples of this product as it was gifted by La Mer and I think the name speaks for it self. It really is a soft and moisturizing cream.  A normal size product should honestly last you a year because a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite moisturizers as a professional makeup artists it leaves the skin supple and ready for foundation. When I use it for skincare I like to lather it on my whole body because it moisturizes like butter It may be expensive but it’s worth it to me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't think I would have enough product to leave a review but a little does go a long way! The price tag is $$$ but honestly after using it for two weeks, I think it might be worth it. I don't want to run out :) this is complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer cream has a very strong floral scent that you often get from those old-school soaps. The scent dissipates quickly, so I don't find it a problem at all. Some strong scents do give me a headache, but this isn't too bad. I get why it's called Soft Cream because the texture is indeed quite soft, melty, and very moisturizing on the skin. A little goes a long way, and it is a good expensive moisturizer! I would absolutely love to own a full-size or the whole routine one day. I think that's the only way to properly review La Mer as a brand. *This was a sample, and it's gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the new moisturizing soft cream  complimentary from La Mer. Ive been using it for about a week and it does make my skin moisturized, it makes it feel hydrated, its very little weight and its probably one of my favorite skin lotions that I've tried in a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love love this moisturizer,  you only need a tiny bit as it goes a long way.  It has a very light weight texture and leaves the skin feeling great and not greasy.  I've noticed before using this product my skin was very dry, now my skin is silky and smooth.  (Gifted by La Mer).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is so nice! It feels light weight but also very moisturizing! I also do feel like you don’t have to use much for your entire face which is nice because it’ll make a tub go a long way! Overall made my skin feel soft, look smooth, and moisturized This was gifted to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a couple of samples (3.5 mL) of the La Mer moisturizing soft cream. A little product goes a long way and I do really like the texture. I’m interested in using this product over a long-term to see!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from La Mee. This was My first time trying LA Mer and I was so excited to do so! This cream feels so luxurious. My skin felt softer than ever after using. I have quite dry skin and this definitely delivered great Hydration. The price is crazy, but it's definitely a bougie experience and I loved it. A little goes a very long way I also love the fresh smell. All in all this was a great experience and great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I instantly fell inlove with this product, I have dry skin and it’s amazing.  My skin looks amazing and soft to the touch and feels hydrated.  I thought this product was a bit pricey, but it’s actually worth it. my very generously sized sample jar goes a very very long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer so much! it feels luxurious on my skin. it is lightweight but also very thoroughly moisturizing. I also really like the clean soft scent. I have been loving using this before I apply my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was soooo excited to try this. It’s everything I expected but the price point is why I gave it one less star. its very moisturizing and soothing too and I feel refreshed when applying. Has a slight smell but it’s ok.  I can definitely tell a difference between this and other brands, but do I always want to spend this amount: no!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just received this product and I now get the hype! This is the best moisturizer I have ever tried. It hydrates my skin but does not make it oily. The texture is perfect when it mixes in with my foundation. Definitely will purchase in the future regardless of the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely not. Lemaire products are very overpriced and the ingredients are absolute trash. I would definitely not recommend spending this kind of money on skin care way better alternative is out there that are better for your skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing soft cream is absolutely amazing! It feels so nice on my skin, doesn’t burn and the fragrance is really light and smells clean! I love adding this to my night time skin care routine because it gives me an amazing glazed donut glow!

reviews.review_title: Wonderful cream, but the price is so steep
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream feels very luxurious—it really is creamier and softer to the touch than any other lotion, cream, or moisturizer I have felt. It’s got a thin, but pillowy consistency, and it is very hydrating on my skin. It does have a light scent to it; not sure if it’s added fragrance or just the natural smell of the ingredients, but it doesn’t linger or bother me. It’s a great moisturizer for my dry skin, but it’s simply too expensive. Still rating it 5 stars because review-wise, the hefty price is my only complaint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So in love with this Moisturizer from La Mer. It works wonders on my dry skin and I love that it's made with really good ingredients. It is also paraben free which is a must for face products. I definitely recommend this moisturizer and all of La Mers other skincare products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer, which is lightweight and absorbs easily, but still really effective. I’ve been using it morning and night this winter and it’s kept my dryness at bay.  A little bit goes a long way with this!

reviews.review_title: My favorite part of my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The new Crème de La Mer is an outstanding moisturizer that truly deserves its five-star rating. One of the standout features of this luxurious skincare product is its lightweight texture, which makes it a delight to apply and wear.  Despite its light consistency, a little goes a long way with this moisturizer, and you'll be amazed at how effectively it nourishes and hydrates your skin. The formula melts effortlessly into your skin, leaving no greasy residue, but instead delivering a luminous, healthy, and youthful-looking complexion.  As someone who loves to wear makeup, I was thrilled to discover that the Crème de La Mer works incredibly well under makeup. It provided a smooth and even base that made my foundation look flawless and lasted throughout the day.  I noticed a significant difference in the texture, tone, and overall appearance of my skin after just a few uses, and the effects only continued to improve with continued use. The Crème de La Mer is perfect for all skin types and delivers incredible results that are worth every penny.  In summary, if you're looking for a luxurious, high-quality moisturizer that is lightweight, a little goes a long way, and works well under makeup, the new Crème de La Mer is an exceptional choice. It delivers remarkable results that will leave your skin looking and feeling nourished, hydrated, and rejuvenated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This feels so good on my skin! The texture is really light weight while being super moisturizing. My skin is smooth, fresh, and hydrated each time I use it! This product was gifted to me for this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing cream complimentary from La Mer is so good! It is very light-weight and a little goes a long way. I love the way this leaves my skin feeling so soft and smooth. I would recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love how soothing and moisturizing this cream is! I was so surprised how much a little goes a long way and I feel like it really soaks into the skin. Definitely felt a difference afterwards. I was gifted by Le Mer  but I would invest in La Mer, its worth the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the light weight feel of this moisturizer and I like the scent too. It does have a fragrance to it so take note of that. It feels very rich and moisturizing while being light at the same time. I received it gifted by La Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer!! It’s super soft and thin. Different than the original which is thicker. I love the way this goes on my skin and leaves it feeling super hydrated without extra residue. I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eye cream has a slight sweet scent it is pleasant but does smell like baby powder and the scent last long. The cream soaks into the skin and really makes my skin feel hydrated. Comes in a cute little bag. Gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product, my skin feels so moisturized after and the product is so creamy and light on my face. I’ve been using it for about two weeks and I feel like my face is glowing the whole day and moisturized. I also like that it’s pretty high quality clean ingredients

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven’t used it for the 8 weeks yet, which seems to be recommended for best results, but I do already notice visibly plumper, healthier, firmer, lifted-looking skin. I like that the ingredients contain antioxidant to protect skin from irritation, because my skin is really sensitive. Also the ingredient that promotes healing as my skin really needs some healing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little moisturizer goes a long way! I’m always concerned with dry skin! And this moisturizer really hydrated and moisturized my skin! Perfect for travel size and fits in your bag, keep dry skin at bay. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use it before i go to sleep. My skin feels so good next morning. It gives my skin hydration and plumper. like that it is light weight and you dont need to use a lot of them. So it wont go empty for awhile.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product in exchange for honest review. I have used lamer before and it’s a well known brand that most celebrities use as well. It is a luxury brand so the price tag is definitely steep. Based on the price I feel the product is not that special. It moisturizes well but I didn’t notice a huge difference in my skin like I have with other products that are lower price. Overall if you have the money to splurge go ahead but if you don’t there are other products that can provide you with better results and better looking bank account.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have an extensive moisturizing routine when it comes to my skin, especially since giving birth. I have a whole night time routine, but even with that I still wake up and need more moisture. So I tried this in the morning and I love how soft and silky it is! It seems to give my skin life again so I’m going to keep using it and see how I feel! This will be my daytime moisturizer until I run out!

reviews.review_title: Good lotion, but worth the cost???
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the mini samples of this product and they’ve lasted me a while due to the consistency. This lotion melts into my skin well. It’s hydrating, but doesn’t leave any stickiness, so I can use it before even my powder foundations. My two criticisms are that it smells a little old fashioned and I have found cheaper lotions that have the same results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer.  What I first initially liked about this product is how light weight  the texture of the cream is, I used a small amount and I was able to cover my whole face and neck area so a little goes a long way with this product.  After I used it my skin looked plumped and fresh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is very soft, I’d say pillow soft. A little goes a long way. I put 4 dots of the cream on my face. It’s lightweight and has a light scent to it, you can’t smell it once applied. After cleansing the skin and letting it air dry my skin is slightly tight and definitely needs hydration. After applying this cream my face feels hydrated and supple. It also has a slight glow to it.   The cream is beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using the original La Mer moisturizing cream for a few years, so I was curious to see how the soft cream compares. It’s quite similar, but it’s a bit lighter and not as thick. I find I have to use more of it to quench my dry skin, so I think it would be ideal for those with normal or combination skin. The cream feels soothing from the moment of application and sinks in quickly without any stickiness or greasiness. It does contain added fragrance, which seems unnecessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is not what I expected. It’s very lightweight but super nourishing. The main complaint I have is the strong fragrance. It’s very overpowering. Also, the price is absurd. This is hundreds of dollars. I will be skipping this one in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My skin has never felt so hydrated. I have normal to dry skin and am always on the hunt for a moisturizer that ACTUALLY leaves my skin refreshed and hydrated. Le Mer definitely is a staple. A little some size amount goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream was gifted by La Mer for me to try, and I was genuinely surprised by how much I like it! It's a lightweight cream, and a little definitely goes a long way--which is really saying something because I have extremely dry skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you don’t like moisturizer with a scent or fragrance, don’t get this one!! The first time I tried it, I put a small amount on my face and immediately had to take it off because of the strong scent. I also cannot believe how much it costs!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All day healing moisture that makes my skin visibly plumper, healthier, firmer, lifted-looking! This cream helps my skin brace against future signs of age and comes in a silky-soft texture. Love the feeling it leaves on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this moisturizer! I have been using it for years- I love how lightweight it is and that such a little goes a long way! It brings my dull skin back to life! After I use it my skin feels plump and looks glowy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so excited that I was gifted by La Mer the new moisturizing soft cream! I love how light weight the cream feels on my skin. A little definitely goes a long way! My skin already feels plumper and healthier. I will continue to use this cream to achieve the ageless look I have always wanted.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The la mer soft moisturizing cream is my favorite moisturizer. Doesn’t clog pores, perfect scent, hydrates and plumps the skin. The best moisturizer. A bit expensive but worth it especially for mature skin

reviews.review_title: Worth all of the hype & every penny!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this cream! The smell is absolutely divine. It has a great creamy texture but doesn’t feel heavy on the skin at all. I have chronically dry skin and it has truly transformed my skins texture and leaves my skin feeling supple and hydrated all day long. I’ve been using it morning and night. My husband isn’t thrilled by how much I love it due to the price but 100% worth every penny and lives up to the hype!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to love this so much but it just doesn’t live up to it’s hype for me. This gives me nivea lotion vibes (smells and feels like it). It stings my eyes a little too which I’ve never experienced with any moisturizer before. A little is supposed to go a long way but I needed way too much for it to actually hydrate my dry skin. Yes my skin is hydrated but only after using a lot of product and dealing with stinging eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is so luxurious, it leaves my skin super supple. I love the glow it leaves behind and it wears beautifully under my makeup. this product was gifted to me and I will be making a purchase once my sample is done

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loveeee this moisturizer!! you dont have to use alot because alittle bit goes a long long way! it is very light weight so you dont feeel sticky because i dont like that feeling!! it works really well. gifted by la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you have oily skin and you’re looking for a reliable moisturizer for deep hydration, this is it! My skin breaks out with most moisturizers but I haven’t had any issues since using this, and my skin is producing less oil now that it’s properly hydrated. I recommend using it as a nighttime mask

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how hydrating and rich this is! It’s a very luxe moisturizer, but the bottles I got are tiny! It has a light pleasant scent and I do enjoy it. I would recommend if it wasn’t so expensive. But overall it’s really nice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There is a reason this moisturizer is so iconic. I started using this when my last very basic clean ingredient drugstore moisturizer ran out and my skin could feel the difference immediately. It makes me wish I needed to use it more so I could apply all day, but it holds up so well I don’t need to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for about 2 weeks now. It is very creamy and luxurious. I do feel like i'm at a spa whenever I apply it. I particularly like it before doing my makeup as it gives me a flawless base. Wish it didn't contain fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer. I'll be honest I'd probably never afford this on my own due to the high price tag. It's supposed to help hydrate and moisturize, while keeping wrinkles at bay. The sample is too small to tell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A little goes a long way with this moisturizer! It feels so light weight on the skin yet I feel like it hydrated my skin so well. The texture is so nice and luxurious, but the price tag is hefty so not sure I would buy it all the time unless I was treating myself! *Gifted by La Mer*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the LaMer cream as a gift 2 days ago. I have been using it daily ever since. And when I say daily, I truly only need it once a day. A little goes a long way, so be aware! It dries quickly but somehow my skin looks luminous and glowing as if it were still wet. No sticky feeling and super gentle scent. A truly great lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product complimentary from La Mer and let me just say that this cream has such a light weight texture, yet is so hydrating! A little scoop really does go a long way and it felt super moisturizing on my face. I have extremely dry skin and this really felt super magical!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed getting to try this cream, it was very luxe and hydrating! However, I do not think it does enough to be priced the way it is. While I enjoyed my experience, it didn’t feel like it did anything spectacular that another moisturizer couldn’t do, which was disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: La mer products are luxury but they really are the best. I love this cream. My skin has never looked better and it smells amazing! Trust the investment it’s so worth it. Will forever buy again. Must have skincare

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best cream ever! The fine texture instantly dissolves into skin, very moisturizing! I love pating it over my face, neck, and under the eye area and apply day and night. It helps povide a more vigorous and younger looking complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I have been using it only for a couple of days and I noticed how smooth my skin feels like, my skin also feels super soft and refreshed after using it. Can’t wait to try more products from this brand because I loved this one!

reviews.review_title: A great addition to your skincare
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is soo nourishing for my dry combo skin. I’ve never had such a glow from a product. I can’t wait to to keep incorporating this into my every day skin care routine. I probably won’t use this every day but cycle it every 2 days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice cream for underneath makeup, but a little too thick for everyday use without makeup. My skin is more oily & it definitely did not agree with my skin when I was not wearing makeup but underneath a matte foundation it was beautiful and made my skin look so smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La mer gifted me a sample size and I though this is not even going to be enough for half the face when I got it. But a little goes along way you don’t need a lot to cover the desired areas. The texture is very pleasant and you can feel and see the difference of the before and after La Mer!

reviews.review_title: I want more of if but my wallet can’t keep up yet
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got the samples of this to try it out. It feels so luxe. It does not feel oily at all and feels so hydrating. It came on such cute and simple packaging and on a travel pouch. Now I know why my friends and family love this product. I gave it 5 stars because the product really is high quality. Only thing keeping me from giving repurchasing in full size is the price point. I wish I could afford this 😭

reviews.review_buyer_description: Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is Complimentary from La Mer . it's the perfect natural smelling  moisturizer for those who love a very natural light weight moisturizer. A little goes a very long way it took my skin from looking dull and dry to very moisturized. It isn't super oily either perfect moisturizer for wearing underneath your makeup !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was gifted to me by La Mer to review and honestly, the amount I received was only enough for a couple days use.  The product is rich and feels nice,  but there's no way of knowing if the long term claims stand or not.  It's definitely a good product, but I'm not sure if it's worth the price.  If you can get a sample, definitely try if for yourself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fine moisturizer, wears well under makeup and doesn’t have too strong a scent. But no way is it worth the money, others do the same thing at 10% the cost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately, I can tell why this is a cult favorite! This moisturizer is extremely creamy, luxurious and hydrating. I think it’s best to use in drier months because of the instant hydration you will get after using it! Also, it didn’t break me out or clog my pores, so I’ll be using this every day. One word. Obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La Mer in exchange for my honest opinion.   This Moisturizing Soft Cream from La Mer is luxury skincare at its finest! With a soft, floral scent, lightweight texture, and a product that spreads easily, I find it enjoyable to apply. I especially love how soft it leaves my skin afterwards!!! A little goes a long way, and the hydration lasts me for several hours. It applies to my skin looking matte, and helps my skin appear more plump and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is luxurious and perfectly hydrating (for my combo skin) with a lightweight texture. A small bit of product goes a long way, which I like because the price point makes me want to savor every ounce! After use, my skin feels smoother and my skin barrier nourished. Complimentary from La Mer

reviews.review_title: My skin just soaks it up!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This La Mer moisturizing soft cream feels light-weight the texture is creamy. It has a light scent.A little bit goes a long way! I use it in the evening and when I wake up in the morning my skin feels firmer and healthier. i also feel like it minimized my pores. My skin just soaks it up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream! It leaves my face feeling soft and clean after my skin care routine. Would recommend this to anyone no matter what kind of skin you have. I have combination skin and it doesn’t clog my pores or leave me feeling greasy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. This moisturizer is very light-weight, which I really like, and with a somewhat subtle fragrance to it. It might be a little too strong for some. It really hydrated my skin as soon as it was being applied and throughout the day it maintained my skin hydrated and plumped.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer was gifted by La Mer for review purposes. I can say it's one of the best moisturizers I've ever tried - I saw an improvement in my skin right away - it was visibly softer, more supple and glowy. The scent was pleasant even though it was a bit strong - I typically prefer non-scented skin care products. If it wasn't for the high price, I'd switch to La Mer in a heartbeat!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try this product for so long! The only downfall for this product is how small it is… I really wish you got more bang for your buck. I will say you do only need a small amount in the product does feel really nice on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed this lotion it is very hydrating and leaves my skin feeling nice. Although for this price range I don’t think i would purchase it. I would just purchase a less expensive product that does the same thing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all lamer products the are so good and makes me feel glamorous. So good for dehydrated skin it gives me the glow that I love and smells great! It’s part of my daily routine and my skin feel luxurious you can feel de quality of the product on your skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have extremely dry skin and have been using La Mer’s moisturizing cream every night. My skin feels extremely soft and supple the next day. I love how it’s super light weight and doesn’t feel greasy. While it is expensive, you only need a little bit since it’s so concentrate. A little definitely goes a long way. It smells very nice but also not overpowering. I feel like I can use it many ways- as a night cream, as an everyday moisturizer and it works great under makeup also. Definitely recommend especially if you have dry sensitive skin like me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I know why it’s called the soft cream because oh my. My skin feels so so baby soft after using this cream. The texture feels luxurious and it has a nice subtle smell to it. A little goes a long which is nice since this is an expensive product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Who doesn’t love a good Moisturizer!! I struggle with dry skin and always have a hard time finding a really good moisturizer! This one might be it for me! My skin loves it and so do I! Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this moisturizer because I’ve seen so much hype around it. I was expecting my life to be changed when I tried this. However, it was really just a regular moisturizer with an expensive price tag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a very good moisturizer.  It smells amazing, not too strong.  It applies beautifully, the texture is so nice and a little goes a long way. I use it at night and wake up to super smooth and soft skin.  Can't really comment on wrinkle improvements.  Only downside is the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Sooo holy wow! This product is expensive - but boy does it feel luxurious. First off - the smell is amazing. Not too overpowering, but there. The texture is silky smooth. I have been using it on my neck at night, and when I wake up - it feels super soft and silky. Definitely a luxury product but worth it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Was so excited to try this moisturizer after hearing how amazing it was and am happy I got small sample size to try it. I love the way it made my face feel and will have to keep trying it to see if I see a difference.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got a small sample size so it’s really hard to tell if irresolute reverse aging As a moisturizer it is decent , I didn’t notice anything major than any other drugstore moisturizer wouldn’t do It’s a no for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product was gifted by La Mer. To write about this cream . First its expensive . But i like it .It's nice when my skin can handle it.  It's best to warm a small amount between clean fingers and tap it lightly into skin.  This cream kept my skin soft for a long time, but eventually I had to admit that there were some things that no amount of moisturizing could heal. This helps avoid the onset of fine lines and wrinkles and keeps your face plump.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by La Mer. This product is really the definition of a little goes a long way. However, it does not feel oily but rather, feels super lightweight. It keeps my face super moisturized and plump!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The absolute best moisturizer! It feels so luxurious and the packaging is so aesthetic. The lightweight texture just glides across my skin! You don’t need too much and the bottle should last you a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve never had the chance to try the moisturizer and I was surprised with how good it is! It has a nice light texture and feeling. It is actually moisturizing, I usually have dryer skin around the winter and this worked well with my skin. It does have a light fragrance to it which I don’t mind but prefer none.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer gives me all day moisture. The formula goes on silky smooth. My skin is visibly plumper, healthier, and firmer looking. You can tell this brand has been around so long for a reason. Love that it’s a science backed skincare.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by La mer. This moisturizer is amazing! I love how hydrating it is and on top of that the packaging is lovely. I have super dry skin during the winter time but this is thick enough to help me with that and keeping my skin not dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before I started using this luxurious moisturizer,  my face looked dull and lifeless. Winter had taken a toll on my skin. After using it for about a week,  I saw such a change in skin from applying this light weight cream. I barely had to use any product at all, because it covers well with minimal product. My skin is looking hydrated and brighter  I received this product complimentary from LA Mer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a luxe, beautiful moisturizer. My skin feels plush & moisturized, but not greasy after using this product. A little does go a long way though, so it'll last for a really long time. This was complimentary from La Mer.

reviews.review_title: Amazing! A must have in my skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely amazing! Thank you for gifting me this free product my skin looks and feels incredible! I just left the beach and my skin was really dry and this helped so much. I’m super glowy and receiving so many compliments!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is very popular brand. I just wanted to try and it was nothing special. It was very tiny product they sent me. If I use more maybe it will be different. Hard to tell about this product. I saw their ingredients and I didn’t like a fragrance in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It feels really nice! A rich, barely scented, luxurious moisturizer for sure. It soaked into my skin quickly but the moisture didn’t leave. My skin felt incredible for hours! If you can comfortably spend the money on this, I would highly recommend! If not, that’s okay too, there’s plenty of more affordable moisturizers out there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is definitely worth the hype. It has transformed my skin in just a few days of using. I have dry skin and this product really nourishes my skin all day. It is very pricey but if you’re able to get your hands on it, it’s definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this it was so smooth and lightweight and it didn’t have a strong smell like a lot of others do! It layered well with all my other products including serums which that usually doesn’t blend together nicely but this did! Definitely understand the price point now!

reviews.review_title: On my bucket list for high end products
reviews.review_text: I hear about this brand long time ago and finally decided to try it. I have dry skin and in the winter is hard for me to keep it hydrated and moisture, but this cream is lovely. My skin absorbed really fast, I like how the moisturizer feel on my skin and how my skin look after. I use a small amount, rub between my fingers for a couple of minutes and press it onto my skin, the package is nothing out of this world and I'm not sure if I would buy it again considering the price/quantity, but as a treat for myself I like it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: okay, it’s good. i’m not super happy with it because i got this as a sample, and usually samples are a full-size product, and they sent me two dollhouse sized tiny, tiny samples with like 2 uses inside. it’s good, but i’m mad i’m not getting enough out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am amazed at what this cream has done for my skin! I feel like my skin is bouncier and more full just after a few uses. I break out really easily and this formula doesn’t feel greasy on the skin, which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The texture of this moisturizer is quite lovely- I wasn’t given enough to truly see the effects and if it changes my skin in anyway but it absorbed nicely and wears well under makeup. The smell however is very unpleasant. It reminds me of a heavily scented cold cream. Something my grandmother would have smothered herself in, in the 90’s, maybe that’s what they were going for. I would rather have a light fragrance or none at all, it’s strong enough to make me not want to use it which is a shame.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received a sample of the cream. And it feels soo good. I have a combination skin, but need to moisturize it and it’s always a problem. La mer cream felt like having the right consistency   Perfect clean feeling after with no greasiness or heaviness on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw the price of this moisturizer, I knew it wouldn’t be worth the price… but then I tried it.  I used both the Soft Cream and the Original and my fave feels like actual silk. I don’t know what is in the “MiracleBroth” but it’s perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been wanting to try la mer moisturizer from a very long time now, I’ve been having dry patches recently and this moisturizer has helped a lot with that. Love how amazing my skin feels after, let’s also not forget how good my makeup looks when using this under my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice formula. A bit pricey but I’d say it’s worth the splurge. It has a light body to it but it goes on so smoothly. It leaves the face feeling very moisturized and slightly dewy (but not sticky).  I also love the fresh clean scent it has to it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this moisturizer, I’ve noticed my pores are a lot smaller, and my skin feels softer and looks healthy. I’ve noticed some of the lines around my eyes has been reduced slightly. The cream is easy to apply and I personally use a spatula to spread it evenly around my skin. It’s be definitely noticed my skin is getting firmer as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Moisturizing Soft Cream was gifted by La Mer for reviewing purposes.  This cream is so soft and luxurious.  It feels very hydrating and makes my skin look soft and supple.  It is light weight and works well under makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is thick and you can feel the lux when you use it. I don’t love the fragrance in the lotion. The moisturizer sits well under my foundation and other makeup. I’d say it a little splurg but worth it.

reviews.review_title: Definitely a splurge, but I love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from La Mer in exchange for my honest review. I love the soft cream! It smells great, and it feels light on. A little goes a long way! It’s not too heavy under my makeup. It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate how much I love this cream, but anytime I get get it as a sample or when La Mer is doing a gift with purchase, I jump on it. It feels ultra luxe and rich on the skin, without being too heavy. I love this cream in the colder months especially.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: La Mer is such an iconic brand and this soft cream doesn’t disappoint! It sinks right in and leaves skin feeling velvety soft! It has the same scent as their other products! I prefer this to the original creme as you don’t have to warm it up and it’s easier to apply. My skin feels so nice when using!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me in exchange for my honest opinion. This cream made my skin feel so plump and smooth which was surprising for how light weight it is. I don’t love the scent because it is a little powdery which I don’t typically like but it is very subtle and the smell doesn’t linger enough to bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this moisturizer. I love the lightweight and soft texture. I love that it doesn’t have much scent. Also a little goes a long way so this will last forever!! I have very try skin and after I put this on, my skin feels so soft and plump

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizing soft cream is a must have! It is extremely lightweight and a little goes a long way. It has a light scent that smells very fresh! I have combination skin and have recently been battling some breakouts. Since using this, my skin is well moisturized, the overall texture is smoother, and my breakouts have been healing really well! I personally use this day & night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been a fan of the La Mer moisturizing face cream for a while and was so excited to try this new launch! I loved the texture and found it to be a bit lighter than the original one. I prefer this for the mornings and the traditional cream for evenings!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a few samples in exchange for an honest review. This product is an OG! It's such a lux product that really helps plump the elasticity back in your skin. I've used this a few days and it's really made my skin hydrating and I notice my skin is more supple - the texture is whipped so little goes a long way!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful texture and long lasting hydration. The texture is so creamy, it spreads easily, a little bit could go a loooong way. You don’t need a regular amount of the product to cover your entire face. It also absorbs easily and doesn’t leave a greasy finish. It also made my skin softer than usual. The scent is nice but I personally prefer products that used on mud face to have a less strong scent for my sensitive nose. Overall this is such a pleasant face cream to try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Literally one of the best moisturizing creams. It definitely lives up to its reputation. It leaves your skin feeling smooth and soft like a baby’s butt. The scent is not bad either. I got a small size but I will be purchasing the large size for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is definitely worth the price! It’s very creamy and just melts into the skin and turns the skin into a dewy glowy base for makeup, and using this at night before bed, you’ll wake up with your skin still nice and glowy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted by from La Mer. I love this moisturizing cream! If it wasn't so pricey, this would be the only lotion that i would ever buy. It is so light weight but really helps my dry winter skin. It goes on nicely and sits under my makeup well. I use at night and in the morning. Also a little goes a long way, so thankfully it can last a decent amount of time!

reviews.review_title: A must have in your routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by La Mer.  The first thing to note is that a little goes a long way.  I didn't have to use much at all to get my skin to really feel moisturized.  The texture is super lightweight and doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy.  I am super glad to have found this product because it really took my skin from dry and dull to moisturized and glowy!

reviews.review_title: A LITTLE GOES A LONG WAY!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love how moisturizing this product is.  I often have a difficult time finding a great moisturizer that hydrates my skin longs enough underneath my makeup and night time and I finally found my holy grail. I am so happy I stumbled across this product it’s worth every penny! I highly recommend it to anytime who needs it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted By La Mer. I also love how thick this goes on yet easily it is absorbed. I have super dry skin so i love how thick it is but sinks in right away without leaving a tacky feeling. Its great under makeup as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is great. Hydrating and lovely on the skin. However I don’t think it’s worth the high spend- if I’m splurging sure but overall it’s okay! This was gifted to me and I’ll continue to use it but I have other favorites that are more affordable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So far my skin looks supple and hydrated. Lately my skin has been looking like it needs a boost. I realized what it was needing is hydration. I have this cream a shot and it’s looking much better. I need like it was the pick em up my skin needed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair
reviews.review_text: Ngl!!! It’s a really great moisturizer. Deeply hydrates and nourishes the skin. I’d recommend if the price point was not what it is. How do you justify this moisturizer when there are others on the market that do similar jobs?

reviews.review_title: A perfect addition to my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It smells nice and fresh and floral. The texture is very light weight a little bit went a long way for me. I have sensitive skin so I was happy to have no reaction a perfect new addition to my skincare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizer is definitely a little goes a long way. The scent is like a light baby powder and it’s not overpowering at all. I used to after a serum and essence which have more watery properties and this you can feel the oils almost just lock everything in. If you wanna feel bougie def get this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely the best moisturizer I have ever used. It’s lightweight but still keeps your skin so hydrated all day. A little goes a long way too so you don’t have to use a ton to get the most out of this product!

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All of my favorite celebrities and you-tubers swear by La Mer products, so i was so excited to finally get my hands on it and see what all the hype was about for myself. Let me tell you, BAYBEEE this is amazing! A very luxurious cream, my skin felt so supple and soft and smooth. My skin is looking radiant as ever. I feel so nourished, this is definitely worth the price point because all you need is little bit as it goes a very long way. I now understand why the A-Listers bathe in this and look as incredible as they do. As a self proclaimed skincare junkie, I can’t wait to try more of this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Got this as gifted but honestly It is one one of my favorite cream ever. It is super hydrating and It smell so great. The price you are paying for is art. I love It so much I buy them in better size for everyone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely in LOVE with this moisturizer! It’s very lightweight and moisturizing. Really nice as a daytime moisturizer or  under makeup. Definitely worth the splurge! I would definitely recommend this product :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift from La Mer to try and I am obsessed! I have wanted to try this out for years and am so glad I finally did. My skin feels so incredible, soft and radiant after using this moisturizer, I will be purchasing the full size!! A little bit goes a long way so the product itself can last you for a while!! It’s extremely lightweight and goes on the skin so effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received this product gifted by La Mer and after using it I am so hooked! My skin texture has softened out & has stayed moisturized for longer periods of time. The smell is a little strong in my opinion, but the cream is so worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first ever La Mer product *eeeeek* I am very excited because girl this is definitely a luxury item that everyone wants ! I absolutely love how it feels on the skin. So light weight and little definitely goes a long long wayyyy!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with this cream. It is the first time that I use a La Mer product but I must say that I have not been disappointed. Worth every penny. I like that the texture is light but very little is enough. It leaves your skin super soft and hydrated.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has a cult following for a reason! It’s so rich and creamy. It’s truly so luxurious. It makes my skin so soft and hydrated. I mostly notice how beautiful my makeup applies when I use this in my skin prep.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this cream complimentary from La Mer. This is my second time trying this cream, and while I wouldn't buy it myself due to the exorbitant price--It is a very nice product. It's a super soft and creamy texture and creates a nice barrier over thinner serums and toners. I love the light powdery scent and the overall user experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is a blessing that I didn't know I needed! My skin felt extremely hydrated and plump after using this product. I can stay the price is up there but the product does the magic I expected. When I can I will be purchasing again! gifted by la mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this was gifted by Lamer. and omg my first luxurious brand! this cream is seriously so good and moisturizing. a little really does go a long way with this product. it makes my skin super hydrated. a must!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cream is absolute magic! I love the light-weight texture of the cream and I love how my makeup sits after I apply it. A little goes a long way with this product - definitely worth the price and I can't wait to continue using it. This product was gifted by La Mer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Pretty moisturizing and great size for travel although a bit small will only use twice. I felt hydrated after using it. Love la mer. Very luxurious and exactly how you’ll feel when you put it on your face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: gifted by La Mer It is so worth the price point! This is luxury skincare, but beyond that the cream is truly rich and moisturizing! Love how a pea size amount goes a long way. I can see this product lasting a very long time! it is light weight and not heavy on the skin so perfect for both my AM/PM skincare routine.

reviews.review_title: A must have for luxury skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is just luxurious and lovely on my skin. My face is visibly plumper and firmer after using this cream and my skin seems less irritated than usual. I would definitely recommend to my family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This moisturizers is next level! It is incredible! I’ve never used a better moisturizer. My skin has never looked so plump and healthy before. It’s kinda pricey but I really think it’s worth the splurge.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So good for dehydrated skin. I'm sure this moisturizer works great for all skin types but as someone who has dry skin - especially in the winter, this moisturizer had my skin feeling really hydrated & it smells great ◡̈

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product feel so luxurious on the skin. It gives me the ultimate glow and radiance that I love. It is a bit pricey but if you want to spend money definitely spend it here on this product. I highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all La Mer products, they are always consistently good and make me feel so glamorous and moisturized when I purchase and use their products. I also love how thick this goes on yet easily it is absorbed. complimentary from La Mer
